COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No parent of any ethnicity would be happy to raise their children in the trailer parks, where there is neither drinking water nor electricity!

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يغتصبون نساءنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women should not be defended because of nationality but as human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يغتصبون نساءنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Fortunately, women are no longer property. I would like rape to be condemned regardless of the nationalities involved.

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يغتصبون نساءنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape and gender violence must be condemned in any case, not on the color of the aggressor's skin.

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يغتصبون نساءنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Reports to the violence centers show that women are also raped by 'our' natives.

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يغتصبون نساءنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The truth is that the rapes committed by foreigners have more media coverage. Data coming from institutional sources confirms this. [link]

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يغتصبون نساءنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Given that rape is to be condemned regardless of who committed it, statistics says that most incidents of rape are committed in the home, and not by foreigners.

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يغتصبون نساءنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Excuse me, but are women property? Or owned by the nation? I don't think so.

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يغتصبون نساءنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is a crime regardless of who commits it. Full stop.

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يغتصبون نساءنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Considering the crimes of a person as representative of the whole category is very superficial and discriminatory.

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يغتصبون نساءنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This generalization is very misleading.

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يغتصبون نساءنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The phenomenon is very complex and the data must be read carefully: most of the violence against women occurs in the home and goes unreported

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يغتصبون نساءنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not a property and must be protected, regardless of the color of their skin or that of their aggressors

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يغتصبون نساءنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unfortunately, violence against women is a social plague without colour. You think most of the rapes in Italy are committed by Italian men, who are often their partners.

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يغتصبون نساءنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A crime is a crime, regardless of who commits it. Rape is always to be condemned, but it is important not to use it as a gimmick to target a particular group. Women should not be used as an excuse for this.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب عزل المثليين لأنهم ينشرون الإيدز في جميع أنحاء العالم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you want to isolate someone then there is only one "high-risk group" to focus on. It is made of all those who have frequent unprotected sex with different partners. Being gay does not make you a part of this by default.

HATE_SPEECH: لا يمكننا السماح للمثليين بالتبرع بالدم. قد ينقلون مرضهم العقلي ويجعلون الآخرين مثليين عن طريق التبرع بالدم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being gay doesn't affect blood receivers! It's not like being gay is in your blood. Gay people are the same as regular people and if they really wanted to donate, then they should because it can help society.

HATE_SPEECH: المثلية مرض عقلي يمكن علاجه [link].
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The source is not reliable at all, as the webpage promote "reorientation therapies" whose effects hasn't been scientifically proven. The owners are likely to profit from misinformation and bad stereotypes about homosexuality.

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون ينشرون الإيدز في جميع أنحاء العالم لأنهم منحرفون وينامون مع الغرباء، يجب منعهم من التبرع بالدم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We can simply disallow donations from those who had unprotected sex or a high number of partners, instead of making sexual orientation the basis as in your claim.

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون ينشرون الإيدز في جميع أنحاء العالم لأنهم منحرفون وينامون مع الغرباء، وهم يكذبون عندما يريدون التبرع بالدم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is little to no reason for them to do so; if they wish to donate blood, evidently they have a degree of care about others. Lying would contradict the very reasons they might want to donate.Homophobic statements rarely make much sense.

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون منحرفون، فهم منحلون وينامون مع الغرباء.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are much more likely to have unprotected sex than homosexual and heterosexual men combined. [https://ifstudies.org/blog/promiscuous-america-smart-secular-and-somewhat-less-happy]

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون منحرفون ويجب عزلهم عن المجتمع لأنهم يمارسون الجنس الشرجي وينشرون أمراضًا مثل الإيدز.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: While anal sex may be a more high risk practice than vaginal \(due to the lack of mucus\) that is not a reason to ban gay men, since other groups can also engage in anal sex.

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون منحرفون ويجب عزلهم عن المجتمع لأنهم يمارسون الجنس الشرجي وينشرون أمراضًا مثل الإيدز.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you know that research shows that about 10% of heterosexual women/men have had anal sex in the past year, with 25% having tried it at least once? [https://kinseyconfidential.org/common-anal-sex-heterosexual-couples/] Do you want to isolate them as well?

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون منحرفون ويجب علاجهم لأنهم يمارسون الجنس الشرجي طوال الوقت.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Is this true for anal sex between men and women too then?

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون خطيرون: ينشرون الإيدز في جميع أنحاء العالم لأنهم منحرفون وينامون مع الغرباء!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Associating AIDS and HIV with homosexuals is just a prejudice driven by fear. Even if this disease may be more common among gay people, that does not mean that all homosexuals are likely to have AIDS. Not all homosexuals are promiscuously fornicating with strangers, as you said. Most people check their partners, more so as gay men.

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون خطيرون: ينشرون الإيدز في جميع أنحاء العالم لأنهم منحرفون وينامون مع الغرباء!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Only questionnaires and history of sexual contact should identify a donor as safe or unsafe, not their sexual preferences.

HATE_SPEECH: اللوطيون منحرفون ويريدون غسل عقول أطفالنا. لنحظرهم من المدارس!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A ban for gay men merely propagates homophobic stereotypes, and so are you with what you are suggesting.

HATE_SPEECH: اللوطيون يسيئون استخدام شرجهم ثم يريدون إراحة ضميرهم بالتبرع بالدم. لنوقفهم!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not understand from your argument why gay men should not be allowed to donate blood.

HATE_SPEECH: اللوطيون يسيئون استخدام شرجهم ثم يريدون إراحة ضميرهم بالتبرع بالدم. لنوقفهم!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Limiting any healthy individual from donating is discriminatory, you should know that.

HATE_SPEECH: اللوطيون يسيئون استخدام شرجهم ثم يريدون إراحة ضميرهم بالتبرع بالدم. لنوقفهم!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Still, other groups (such as gay women) have not been banned from donating, so why should they be?

HATE_SPEECH: السماح للمثليين بالتبرع بالدم يعرض سلامة المرضى للخطر لأنهم يمارسون الجنس الشرجي غير الآمن طوال الوقت.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you know that women also engage in unprotected 'anal sex'? Additionally, approximately 2% of heterosexual men have admittedly had a same sex partner, and 39% of homosexual men have had sex with a partner of the opposite sex. Therefore, it cannot be ignored that heterosexual are correlatively high risk.

HATE_SPEECH: السماح للمثليين بالتبرع بالدم يعرض سلامة المرضى للخطر بسبب سلوكهم الجنسي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many countries use a deferral window of 1 year to makes it safe for men who have sex with men to donate blood.

HATE_SPEECH: السماح للمثليين بالتبرع بالدم يعرض سلامة المرضى للخطر بسبب سلوكهم الجنسي الذي ينشر أمراضًا مثل الإيدز. على الأقل يجب اختبارهم!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To be honest, the potential for malice in humans is reason enough to test everyone's blood.

HATE_SPEECH: السماح للمثليين بالتبرع بالدم يعرض سلامة المرضى للخطر بسبب سلوكهم الجنسي الذي ينشر أمراضًا مثل الإيدز.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you know that out of people receiving HIV care (for example in the UK), 48% were exposed through sex between a man and a woman, and 47% were exposed through sex between men? The fact is that heterosexual HIV transmissions outweigh those between homosexuals, and yet heterosexual people are not banned from donating blood. [link]

HATE_SPEECH: السماح للمثليين بالتبرع بالدم يعرض سلامة المرضى للخطر بسبب سلوكهم الجنسي الذي ينشر أمراضًا مثل الإيدز.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If we're to use that logic, then no individuals age 20 to 29 should be allowed to donate, since this is the largest risk group for HIV, Hepatitis A, and Hepatitis C, at least according to the CDC.[https://www.cdc.gov/hiv/default.html]

HATE_SPEECH: السماح للمثليين بالتبرع بالدم يعرض سلامة المرضى للخطر بسبب سلوكهم الجنسي الذي ينشر أمراضًا مثل الإيدز.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Limiting donors to such an extent (i.e. by excluding all gay people) would limit the amount of available blood and potentially lead to shortages.

HATE_SPEECH: السماح للمثليين بالتبرع بالدم يعرض سلامة المرضى للخطر بسبب سلوكهم الجنسي الذي ينشر أمراضًا مثل الإيدز.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If Stem cell donations are allowed by MSMs, then so should blood.

HATE_SPEECH: السماح للمثليين بالتبرع بالدم يعرض سلامة المرضى للخطر بسبب سلوكهم الجنسي الذي ينشر أمراضًا مثل الإيدز.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many countries allow gay men to donate with no deferral. This proves it is safe, unless they are all crazy of course.[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Men_who_have_sex_with_men_blood_donor_controversy#List_of_countries_with_their_stand_on_MSM_blood_donors]

HATE_SPEECH: السماح للمثليين بالتبرع بالدم يعرض سلامة المرضى للخطر بسبب سلوكهم الجنسي الذي ينشر أمراضًا مثل الإيدز.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All blood is tested for pathogens and viruses, without regard to donor background or similar. I really do not understand your concern: "Each unit of blood donated in the U.S. is routinely screened for various infectious disease pathogens, including five transfusion–transmitted viruses, using nine laboratory tests." - [link]

HATE_SPEECH: يجب عدم السماح للمثليين بالتبرع بالدم أبدًا: إنهم ينشرون الإيدز في جميع أنحاء العالم لأنهم منحرفون وينامون مع الغرباء!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Before donating, patients should fill-in a questionnaire where they are asked about their sexuality. If this is considered pertinent information and the patient is taken at their word about being homosexual, then equally the patient can be trusted about the declared sexual history, making sexuality irrelevant.

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون خطيرون: إنهم ينشرون الإيدز في جميع أنحاء العالم لأنهم منحرفون وينامون مع الغرباء!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Age, Race, and Gender are categories that take precedence over Homosexuality. This is since such categories include both homosexual & heterosexual individuals; and are therefore higher risk categories than Homosexuality alone...

HATE_SPEECH: حتى لو سمحت بعض الدول للشواذ بالتبرع بالدم، فهذا لا يعني أنهم ليسوا خطيرين ومعرضين لنشر الأمراض.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Any decision embarked on by a country would likely have been considered in light of evidence. As such, if no evidence was found by those countries of the harm of a policy, it can be fairly confidently asserted that we can adopt this policy in favour of homosexual's blood donation.

HATE_SPEECH: السماح للمثليين بالتبرع بالدم يعرض سلامة المرضى للخطر بسبب سلوكهم الجنسي. يجب أن نوقفهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You know what? We can also grade blood packs based on their "risk". This allows the optional use of high-risk blood in case of a shortage.

HATE_SPEECH: السماح للمثليين بالتبرع بالدم يعرض سلامة المرضى للخطر بسبب الأمراض التي قد ينقلونها.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Improvements in testing and other safeguards have reduced the risk from transfusion transmitted HIV, so ruling out donors only because of their sexual orientation is completely meaningless.

HATE_SPEECH: السماح للمثليين بالتبرع بالدم يعرض سلامة المرضى للخطر بسبب الأمراض التي قد ينقلونها.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Blood is always needed. It is simply illogical to bar donations to a commodity in short supply. It is better to improve control in case.

HATE_SPEECH: السماح للمثليين بالتبرع بالدم يعرض سلامة المرضى للخطر واختبار جميع المتبرعين المثليين سيكون مكلفًا جدًا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We already test blood from all groups, not only homosexual ones. There is no added expense than just using low risk groups.

HATE_SPEECH: لقد سئمت من النساء المشاركات في النقاش السياسي. النسوية قوة تقسيمية في المجتمع.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism strives for equality, not for division.

HATE_SPEECH: إذا كانت النسوية حقًا عن المساواة، لكانوا أسموها "المساواتية" أو أي هراء مشابه.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sometimes we must go beyond "technical equality" and give protections to one gender that the other simply does not need.

HATE_SPEECH: إذا كانت النسوية حقًا عن المساواة، لكانوا أسموها "المساواتية" أو أي هراء مشابه.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Equalism would mean the movement for equality in general. Feminism is focused on gender. Animal rights, gay rights, anti-racism, sexism, etc. are separate issues inside the movement for equality.

HATE_SPEECH: إذا كانت النسوية حقًا عن المساواة، لكانوا أسموها "المساواتية" أو أي هراء مشابه.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In fact some think that "Gender Equality" would be a better than "Feminism".Either way, there is still the problem of inequality to be solved.

HATE_SPEECH: في الغرب، لدى النساء مساواة قانونية وحقوق متساوية ويحميهن القانون من التمييز: يجب أن يتوقفن عن الشكوى.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because there is less evidence of oppression does not mean there is none, and you can find many examples in the newspaper everyday.

HATE_SPEECH: في الغرب، لدى النساء مساواة قانونية وحقوق متساوية ويحميهن القانون من التمييز: يجب أن يتوقفن عن الشكوى.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because women in the West have equality under the law does not mean they have equality in practice. Don't you agree?

HATE_SPEECH: في الغرب، لدى النساء مساواة قانونية وحقوق متساوية ويحميهن القانون من التمييز: يجب أن يتوقفن عن الشكوى.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Ok. But what about those many women, outside the western world, that still do not have such equality? It is important that women 'whine' all over the world to protect their rights.

HATE_SPEECH: في الغرب، لدى النساء مساواة قانونية وحقوق متساوية ويحميهن القانون من التمييز: يجب أن يتوقفن عن الشكوى.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you sure? Even in the west, there are women who still don't have equal access to many of their rights, especially when it comes to healthcare. [https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2018/05/this-map-depicts-abortion-access-across-america-and-its-really-bleak/]

HATE_SPEECH: في الغرب، لدى النساء مساواة قانونية وحقوق متساوية ويحميهن القانون من التمييز: يجب أن يتوقفن عن الشكوى.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: While nowadays there may be fewer examples of overt oppression, that does not remove hidden oppression, nor does it mean that equality has been completely achieved.

HATE_SPEECH: لقد سئمنا من النسويات اللواتي يحاولن تقويض احترام الذات لدى الذكور. [link]
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a generalization: movements which promote abuse of female power over men are just examples of toxic feminism, disapproved of by most women.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء والنسويات لا يردن حقوق وفرص متساوية: إنهن يحاولن السيطرة على المجتمع.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sorry, but this is wrong. Feminism - the theory of the political, economic, and social equality of the sexes - is by definition about equality, first and foremost.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء منافقات، يقلن إنهن يردن المساواة للجميع، لكنهن يركزن فقط على النساء في الديمقراطيات الغربية (لذا النساء البيض غالبًا). ولا يركزن على مشاكل النساء في الشرق الأوسط وأفريقيا وآسيا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That's something women are actively working on, and because of that there is what is called "intersectional feminism". As you can see the goal of a lot of feminists is having a movement representative of all females.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء منافقات، يقلن إنهن يردن المساواة، فلماذا لا يسمينها المساواتية بدلًا من النسوية؟
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since the movement is meant to achieve equality for the oppressed female population, it is called the movement for women: FEMinism. But of course the outcome will be equality.!

HATE_SPEECH: يجب أن تتوقف النساء عن الشكوى: لا توجد مهن محرومة منهن في المجتمع الغربي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not formally, but many are still hostile or unapproachable for women, especially in STEM fields.

HATE_SPEECH: الأطفال المصابون بمتلازمة داون عبء على المجتمع: يجب عزلهم حتى لا يعيقوا تعليم الأطفال العاديين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you know that children with Down syndrome, if surrounded by regularly-developed peers, receive a fundamental boost in their development? This "mix" fosters a positive learning atmosphere and increases engagement and attention in all students. This mean that children with Down syndrome would be a burden to society if isolated, not the contrary.

HATE_SPEECH: الأطفال المصابون بمتلازمة داون مشكلة: إنهم يشجعون التنمر بين الأطفال العاديين. يجب أن يذهبوا إلى مدارس خاصة بهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you think that taking all of the kids with DS out of mainstream education will solve the problem, then you are wrong. Bullying won't go away until we refuse to tolerate it. Bullies will simply target other kids who are overweight; a different colour; or in a number of other ways considered to be different and, thus, a mark for bullying.

HATE_SPEECH: الأطفال المصابون بمتلازمة داون مشكلة: إنهم يشجعون التنمر بين الأطفال العاديين. يجب أن يذهبوا إلى مدارس خاصة بهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If teachers and parents intervene and educate appropriately, the response could be one more of empathy than of antagonism and bullying. Don't you think? Isn't your comment just classic victim-blaming?

HATE_SPEECH: الأطفال المصابون بمتلازمة داون قد يعيقون عملية تطوير الأطفال الآخرين. يجب عزلهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People with Down Syndrome should be taught in mainstream education, because diversity is an enrichment for all.

HATE_SPEECH: الأطفال المصابون بمتلازمة داون قد يعيقون عملية تطوير الأطفال الآخرين. يجب عزلهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Coexisting and studying with handicapped children helps develop sensitivity, insight and understanding

HATE_SPEECH: الأطفال المصابون بمتلازمة داون قد يعيقون عملية تطوير الأطفال الآخرين. يجب عزلهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Children would develop greater empathy and understanding of human differences if they are allowed to interact instead of being separated.

HATE_SPEECH: الأطفال المصابون بمتلازمة داون قد يعيقون عملية تطوير الأطفال الآخرين. يجب عزلهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: An inclusive system makes every child feel part of a community, it fosters a positive learning atmosphere and increases engagement and attention in all students. Thus it is a benefit for all students. [link]

HATE_SPEECH: يجب عزل الأطفال المصابين بمتلازمة داون لأن الأطفال العاديين سيجعلونهم يشعرون بالاختلاف مما يؤدي إلى تمييز غير مرغوب فيه.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Instead, if allowed to access mainstrean education, they would interact all the time with other children and that would cause less discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب عزل الأطفال المصابين بمتلازمة داون لأن الأطفال العاديين سيجعلونهم يشعرون بالاختلاف.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true: interacting with their "normal" peers in a social and educational framework allows them to feel wanted and included.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب عزل الأطفال المصابين بمتلازمة داون، فهم عبء على الأطفال العاديين ولا يمكنهم مواكبة التعليم في المدارس العادية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are various levels of Down syndrome. Some are suitable for education with other children in "normal schools".

HATE_SPEECH: يجب عزل الأطفال المصابين بمتلازمة داون، فهم عبء على الأطفال العاديين ولا يمكنهم مواكبة التعليم العادي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you know that children with Down syndrome, if surrounded by regularly-developed peers, receive a fundamental boost in their development?

HATE_SPEECH: يجب عزل الأطفال المصابين بمتلازمة داون، فهم لا يشكلون عبئًا على الأطفال العاديين فقط بل يحتاجون إلى رعاية واهتمام وعلاج مكثف مما يجعله مكلفًا ويستغرق وقتًا. يمكن استخدام هذا الوقت لتطوير الأطفال الآخرين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Coeducation with regularly-developed kids is a much better investment and reduces cost, time and effort into the bargain.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب عزل الأطفال المصابين بمتلازمة داون، فهم لا يشكلون عبئًا على الأطفال العاديين فقط بل يحتاجون إلى رعاية واهتمام وعلاج مكثف مما يجعله مكلفًا ويستغرق وقتًا. يمكن استخدام هذا الوقت لتطوير الأطفال الآخرين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Coeducation can involve teaching the classmates of children with Down Syndrome to be responsible. As children are often better at approaching children with disabilities than adults, their involvement can be therapeutic, without adding any costs.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب عزل الأطفال المصابين بمتلازمة داون، لا يمكنهم مواكبة التعليم في المدارس العادية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When students are able to demonstrate that they are able to learn, to segragate students will produce the worst outcime for all converned.

HATE_SPEECH: الداونيون مجرد مرضى لا يستطيعون الاندماج في المجتمع بسبب مرضهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So what's your suggestion? Isloation? The real solution is involving them in work and everyday life, since this normalizes their illness and helps the integration with other people.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب عزل أطفال داون، لا يمكنهم مواكبة التعليم في المدارس العادية ويؤثرون سلبًا على تعليم أقرانهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Coeducation benefits neurotypical children as much as Down Syndrome children, as they are surrounded by positive examples of care and attention from authority figures in the knowledge that they, too, will be looked after if in need.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب عزل أطفال داون في مدارس خاصة لمصلحتهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Accessing mainstream education offers opportunities that would otherwise never be available to people with down syndrome because they can work towards the same qualifications, without the stigma that arises from segregated education.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب إعطاء الأشخاص المصابين بمتلازمة داون وظائف خاصة وبسيطة يمكنهم القيام بها بأنفسهم. على الأقل لن يعيقوا إنتاجية الناس العاديين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People with Down syndrome, when supported by colleagues receive a fundamental boost to their productivity? This "mix" also fosters a positive working atmosphere and increases engagement and attention in all workers.

HATE_SPEECH: الداونيون في الصناعة مشكلة: يخلقون توترًا مع العمال الآخرين لأنهم معاقون ولا يمكنهم مواكبة العمل. يجب أن يكون لديهم وظائف خاصة بهم فقط.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you think that taking all of the people with DS out of industry will solve the problems in the workplace, then you are wrong. Tensions won't go away: stressed people will simply target other workers who are overweight; or of a different gender; or in a number of other ways for which they are considered to be not productive enough.

HATE_SPEECH: الداونيون قد يعيقون إنتاجية العمال الآخرين. يجب عزلهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People with down syndrome should work in normal places, because diversity is an enrichment for all.

HATE_SPEECH: الداونيون قد يعيقون إنتاجية العمال الآخرين. يجب عزلهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Coexisting and working with handicapped people may prove insightful for others and help them develop better sensitivity that can in turn improve the working climate.

HATE_SPEECH: الداونيون لا يعرفون شيئًا ويعيقون إنتاجية العمال الآخرين. يجب عزلهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People with DS develop better skills and understanding of human differences when they are allowed to interact, instead of being separated.

HATE_SPEECH: الداونيون قد يعيقون إنتاجية العمال الآخرين. يجب عزلهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: An inclusive working environment and welfare provision make every person feel part of a community, it fosters a positive atmosphere and increases everybody's productivity. Thus it is a benefit for all workers. [link]

HATE_SPEECH: الداونيون قد يعيقون إنتاجية العمال الآخرين لأنهم لا يستطيعون التفاعل بشكل طبيعي. يجب عزلهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are various levels of Down syndrome. Some are suitable for working with other people in "normal workplaces".

HATE_SPEECH: الداونيون مشكلة: يخلقون توترًا مع العمال الآخرين لأنهم معاقون ولا يمكنهم مواكبة العمل. يجب أن يكون لديهم وظائف خاصة بهم فقط.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you know that people with Down syndrome, if surrounded by empathetic peers, receive a fundamental boost in their productivity and can easily keep the pace, even in complex jobs?

HATE_SPEECH: بعض الأجناس لديها قدرات بدنية وإدراكية أقل وبالتالي حياتهم أقل قيمة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say that? All humans are born equally valuable.

HATE_SPEECH: بعض الأجناس لديها قدرات بدنية وإدراكية أقل، وكلما قبلنا ذلك مبكرًا كان أفضل للبشرية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary: believing that all humans are created equal is beneficial for humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: بعض الأجناس لديها قدرات بدنية وإدراكية أقل، ويجب علينا الحفاظ على نقاء ديننا منهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Religious sources agree that all humans are born equal. What is the religion you are talking about?

HATE_SPEECH: حتى الكتاب المقدس يقول إن بعض الأجناس لديها قدرات بدنية وإدراكية أقل.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are several Bible verses and passages that emphasize equality between people and between ancient tribes.

HATE_SPEECH: بعض الأجناس فقيرة لأنها أدنى شأنًا، حتى في نظر الرب.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The rich and poor have this in common: The Lord made them both.

HATE_SPEECH: بعض الأجناس أدنى شأنًا ولا تستحق محبة الرب.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All are born under sin, have sinned, and fall short of the glory of God. (Romans 3:23)

HATE_SPEECH: بعض الأجناس فقيرة لأنها أدنى شأنًا، حتى في نظر الرب.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Humans are all equally made in God’s image. (Genesis 1:26-28)

HATE_SPEECH: بعض الأجناس لديها قدرات بدنية وإدراكية أقل، وكلما قبلنا ذلك مبكرًا كان أفضل للبشرية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: According to science, all human beings belong to one - scientifically determined - species: Homo sapiens.

HATE_SPEECH: بعض الأجناس لديها قدرات بدنية وإدراكية أقل، وكلما قبلنا ذلك مبكرًا كان أفضل للبشرية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We all belong to one - scientifically determined - species: the Homo sapiens. The sooner you accept this, the better it is.

HATE_SPEECH: بعض الأجناس لديها قدرات بدنية وإدراكية أقل، وهذا يجعل عرقنا فريدًا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the sense of those traits, at the individual level, we are all equally unique , making the concept of race useless.

HATE_SPEECH: عرقك يحدد دورك في المجتمع وأخيرًا قيمتك فيه. لهذا السبب بعض الأجناس مجرد قمامة بشرية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Following your reasoning, if one's value depends on one's role in society, then one has no value until they take on a role. Therefore we are all born equal (i.e. valueless).

HATE_SPEECH: عرقك يحدد دورك وقيمتك. لهذا السبب بعض الأجناس مجرد قمامة بشرية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perceived value is not necessarily actual value, especially in the eye of someone who bases their judgment on the concept of race.

HATE_SPEECH: بعض الأجناس لديها قدرات بدنية وإدراكية أقل وبالتالي حياتهم أقل قيمة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A person's value is rooted in their ability to experience feelings, emotions, empathy and self awareness. Since all humans have these capacities, then we are all born equally valuable.

HATE_SPEECH: عرقك يحدد دورك في المجتمع وأخيرًا قيمتك فيه. لهذا السبب بعض الأجناس مجرد قمامة بشرية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All humans have intrinsic value at birth; such value is immeasurable and thus, for all intents and purposes, equal between persons.

HATE_SPEECH: بعض الأجناس لديها قدرات بدنية وإدراكية أقل وبالتالي حياتهم أقل قيمة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This assertion has no scientific basis but regardless, according to the United Nations, every individual has universal human rights from birth. [link]

HATE_SPEECH: يجادل العديد من الفلاسفة بأن البشر لا يولدون متساوين خاصة من حيث الجنس.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although Plato argued that women are physically weaker than men, they are equal in other respects and deserve equal opportunity.

HATE_SPEECH: يجادل العديد من الفلاسفة بأن البشر لا يولدون متساوين، خاصة من حيث العرق.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a so-called 'argument from authority' and thus a logical fallacy. I would like to see some real arguments to support this claim.

HATE_SPEECH: بعض الأجناس لديها قدرات بدنية وإدراكية أقل وبالتالي حياتهم أقل قيمة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If humans are to have value for anything, it is for their choices. Thus, all humans are equal at least until they have made meaningful choices.

HATE_SPEECH: لا يمكننا التعايش في مجتمع مع ملايين الغرباء الذين لا يحترمون ثقافتنا والآخرين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary: living in a multicultural society encourages mutual understanding and respect for humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: هذه غزو: لا يمكننا التعايش مع ملايين الغرباء الذين لا يريدون الاندماج.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Different cultures have different practices for a variety of social interactions and situations. We must allow for exchanges so that the best practices can be utilized by all.

HATE_SPEECH: هذه غزو: لا يمكننا التعايش مع ملايين الغرباء الذين لا يريدون الاندماج ولكنهم يريدون إعادتنا إلى عصر ما قبل التكنولوجيا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary: different cultures have different perspectives and ideas about things. If we are able to share and discuss ideas, it would probably lead people to come up with new ideas and new technologies.

HATE_SPEECH: هذه غزو: لا يمكننا التعايش مع ملايين الغرباء الذين يعرضون عرقنا وثقافتنا للخطر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When different cultures are able to co-exist, they can complement each other, foster innovation and thrive.

HATE_SPEECH: هذه غزو: لا يمكننا التعايش مع ملايين الغرباء الذين يعرضون عرقنا وثقافتنا للخطر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The diversity of a society can only be a good thing as it builds relationships and knowledge.

HATE_SPEECH: هذه غزو: ملايين الغرباء يعرضون عرقنا وثقافتنا للخطر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Differences can be mostly reconcilable with respect and boundaries. But we must want it.

HATE_SPEECH: هذه غزو: ملايين الغرباء يعرضون عرقنا وثقافتنا للخطر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It seems to me that your words derive from fear: the root of intolerance and violence is fear. Respect and openess can help combat that and thus end the fear of an alleged invasion.

HATE_SPEECH: هناك غزو بمستوى غير مسبوق في التاريخ. ملايين الناس يتدفقون عبر حدودنا ليحلوا محل عرقنا وثقافتنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Having different cultures and races is good for societies in general.

HATE_SPEECH: هناك غزو بمستوى غير مسبوق في التاريخ. ملايين الناس يتدفقون عبر حدودنا ليحلوا محل عرقنا وثقافتنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You know what? We need skilled migrants labour, because it helps economic growth and ultimately to preserve our culture that would otherwise collapse.

HATE_SPEECH: هناك غزو بمستوى غير مسبوق في التاريخ. ملايين الناس يتدفقون عبر حدودنا ليحلوا محل عرقنا وثقافتنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The movement and migration of people from different cultures is innevitable in a globalized world.

HATE_SPEECH: هذا غزو بمستوى غير مسبوق في التاريخ. ملايين الناس يتدفقون عبر حدودنا ليحلوا محل عرقنا وثقافتنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most countries have diverse races in them, the key point is about integration. Think about US history, for example.

HATE_SPEECH: زيادة عدم التسامح والعنف تحدث فقط مع الهجرة الجماعية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Intolerance and violence will never be resolved if theycannot be confronted and mutual understanding promoted.

HATE_SPEECH: التعددية الثقافية هي موت المجتمعات الغربية وتهديد قاتل للأقليات غير المحمية بالقوانين العالمية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Ethnic minorities are much safer in societies where cultural pluralism is accepted, and this is a fact [link].

HATE_SPEECH: التعددية الثقافية هي موت المجتمعات الغربية وتهديد قاتل للأقليات غير المحمية بالقوانين العالمية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Multiculturalism prevents ethnocentrism and racism.

HATE_SPEECH: التعددية الثقافية مجرد انحطاط سياسي يضر بالاندماج داخل الأمة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In those countries that are able to accept different cultures, theose cultures became part of the national identity and a source of pride.Look at Canada for example.

HATE_SPEECH: التعددية الثقافية هي موت المجتمعات الغربية، يجب أن نوقف هذا الغزو قبل فوات الأوان.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Monocultural nations struggle to grow. Being open to different cultures helps the nation to expand and thrive.

HATE_SPEECH: هذا غزو: يجب أن نوقف المهاجرين لأن شعبنا لا يقبلهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The more a country takes integration as national policy, the more the citizens accept each other: see for example [link].

HATE_SPEECH: هذا غزو: لا يمكننا التعايش مع ملايين المهاجرين الذين سيدمرون اقتصادنا ورفاهيتنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Skilled migrants labour is a fundamental resource for growing businesses.

HATE_SPEECH: الأشخاص البدينون عبء على المجتمع بسبب اختياراتهم غير الصحية والمتهورة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For most people, obesity is not a choice, at all.

HATE_SPEECH: الأشخاص البدينون عبء على المجتمع بسبب اختياراتهم غير الصحية والمتهورة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being shamed for something you have no control over can be irreversibly damaging to a person's mental health.

HATE_SPEECH: الأشخاص البدينون عبء على المجتمع بسبب اختياراتهم غير الصحية والمتهورة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Making it socially unacceptable to be obese will just increase bullying toward these people, making the problem even worse.

HATE_SPEECH: يمكنني قبول الأشخاص البدينين، لكن لا أقبل السمنة. هذا لا يعني بالضرورة النظر إلى البدينين على أنهم أقل شأنا، لكني ما زلت قلقا طبيا بشأن عاداتهم المتهورة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Obese people have to face stigma in all areas of life. So even if you might be genuinely concerned for their health, the vast majority of obese people are regularly confronted with prejudice and systemic disadvantages based exactly on the perception of obese people as inferior.

HATE_SPEECH: يمكنني قبول الأشخاص البدينين، لكن لا أقبل السمنة. هذا لا يعني بالضرورة النظر إلى البدينين على أنهم أقل شأنا، لكني ما زلت قلقا طبيا بشأن عاداتهم المتهورة. وأعتقد أن معظم الناس يشاركون هذا الرأي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unfortunately there is evidence that weight discrimination (for example in the US) is similar to gender or race discrimination. [link]

HATE_SPEECH: رفض المجتمع للبدينين قد يشجعهم على تبني عادات صحية أكثر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Societal disapproval of obesity calls for a focus on weight and does not fit within efforts to focus on health as a way of encouraging healthy habits and lifestyle choices.

HATE_SPEECH: رفض المجتمع للبدينين قد يشجعهم على تبني عادات صحية أكثر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not easy to monitor how societal disapproval is acted upon. Encouraging disapproval of obese people is likely to increase rude behaviours towards them.

HATE_SPEECH: رفض المجتمع للبدينين قد يشجعهم على تبني عادات صحية أكثر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Societal disapproval can encourage bullying of overweight and obese populations, thus contributing to the problem rather than the solution.

HATE_SPEECH: رفض المجتمع للبدينين قد يشجعهم على تبني عادات صحية أكثر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Obesity is already disapproved of, further discouragement is likely to transform it to shaming behavior.

HATE_SPEECH: رفض المجتمع للبدينين قد يشجعهم على تبني عادات صحية أكثر دون التعرض للتنمر المباشر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being perceived as overweight is already one of the major reasons people get bullied, and in the end it makes no difference if the bullied person loses weight.

HATE_SPEECH: رفض المجتمع للبدينين قد يشجعهم على تبني عادات صحية أكثر دون التعرض للتنمر المباشر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you consider children? Children are often the most exposed to 'fat bullying'. Of overweight 6th graders, 24% of boys and 30% of girls were teased and bullied on a daily basis for their weight. And these figures double for high-school students! [link]

HATE_SPEECH: رفض المجتمع للبدينين قد يشجعهم على تبني عادات صحية أكثر دون التعرض للتنمر المباشر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People tend to choose the most direct and simplest way of enforcing conformity, so it's unlikely that bullying of overweight people would change into "societal disapproval" strategies.

HATE_SPEECH: أنا لا أدعو إلى التنمر أو الشتم على الأشخاص البدينين، فقط إلى بعض الرفض المجتمعي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a terminological nuance. Once body-shaming of obese people is normalised by your definition of "societal disapproval", it will be difficult to ensure that individual members of society carefully consider their exact message before treating overweight people with rudeness.

HATE_SPEECH: أنا لا أدعو إلى التنمر أو الشتم على الأشخاص البدينين، فقط إلى بعض الرفض المجتمعي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This discouragement or disaproval (as you call it) has and will likely continue to take the form of shaming individuals, regardless of the terminology you use.

HATE_SPEECH: رفض المجتمع للبدينين قد يشجعهم على تبني عادات صحية أكثر دون التعرض للتنمر المباشر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Following your proposal, bullies will be able to conceal their aggressive intent under the veil of genuine concern for someone's wellbeing.

HATE_SPEECH: التشهير بالأشخاص البدينين جيد لجعلهم يتبعون عادات صحية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The intent behind the shaming act does not matter to the person being shamed. They may also internalize the shame and come to believe that they are a bad person.

HATE_SPEECH: التشهير بالأشخاص البدينين هو فقط من أجل مصلحتهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if not all shaming carries negative meaning
TARGET: it is difficult for individuals to distinguish between shaming that comes from a place of concern as opposed to discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: بالطبع، يجب أن نميز بين السلوكيات غير الصحية وليس الأشخاص البدينين!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When it comes to judgement, people constantly fail to distinguish the person from his/her behavior, and the terminology you are using is a proof.

HATE_SPEECH: بالطبع، يجب أن نميز بين السلوكيات غير الصحية وليس الأشخاص البدينين!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As your words clearly show, obesity is perceived as the outcome of poor lifestyle decisions or weak power of will. This builds bias against obese people.

HATE_SPEECH: التشهير بالأشخاص البدينين هو فقط من أجل مصلحتهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Shame is by definition a painful social emotion. Trying to cause that is a form of discrimination. Are you aware of that?

HATE_SPEECH: التشهير بالأشخاص البدينين هو فقط من أجل مصلحتهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Hate crimes attack an individual's unchangeable characteristics and cause long lasting feelings of helplessness and powerlessness. Obese people are likely to feel the same way.

HATE_SPEECH: مجتمع الميم فقط يريد غسيل دماغ أطفالنا. لا ينبغي تعليم الهوية الجنسية والتوجه الجنسي في المدارس.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This depends on whether you consider gender identity and sexual orientation to be factual or not; it isn't simply an 'idea' or 'belief', but a fact of life.

HATE_SPEECH: مجتمع الميم فقط يريد غسيل دماغ أطفالنا. لا ينبغي تعليم الهوية الجنسية والتوجه الجنسي في المدارس.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Disagreement with facts does not necessitate their removal from curricula.

HATE_SPEECH: لا ينبغي تعليم الأطفال الانحرافات الجنسية. للعائلات، بسبب خلفياتها الثقافية أو الدينية، الحق في معارضتها.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some parents may be racist and be against teaching about slavery. That doesn't mean that subjects such as this shouldn't be truthfully covered.

TARGET: but the Jews do not represent the only minority in our upper-middle-class society.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود بخيلون ويتحكمون في مجتمعنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's easy to blame minorities. If we want a wealthier life and to get back control over our society
TARGET: we need to get out of bed and do the hard work. How about if we wake up to the problem?

HATE_SPEECH: ماذا يريد اليهود مقابل ولائهم للدولة؟ رعاية صحية مجانية وتعليم وسكن وعمل.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Such conditions would be provided for all people regardless of religion.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود أكثر مهارة في الخداع من الصدق.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are all guilty of this if we fail to condemn hate.

HATE_SPEECH: المتفوقون اليهود يركزون كثيرًا على السيطرة على العالم. يريدون حكم العالم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Of course Jews are focused on 'world domination'
TARGET: even "galaxy domination". But so are Sith Order

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على الحكومة الأمريكية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you be sure that Jews control the US? Who told you this? They have held positions of influence in so many US institutions
TARGET: but that does not mean they control them.

HATE_SPEECH: جميع اليهود مجرمون.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although antisemitism is a pervasive and longstanding problem in many parts of the world
TARGET: it has historically been particularly strong and sustained in our country. Your statement is a further evidence of this.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب أن نزيل اليهود أولاً من دولنا، ثم يمكننا التعايش بين الشعوب.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that Jews are a hindrance to a peaceful society? Maybe the problem is racism and antisemitism.

HATE_SPEECH: وسائل الإعلام اليهودية، والسلطات التعليمية اليهودية، والمحامون اليهود، والرؤساء التنفيذيون اليهود، والساسة اليهود. اليهود يسيطرون على العالم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps you've mistaken Jews for Mafia... It reminds me of Gambino's quote "Judges
TARGET: lawyers and politicians have a license to steal. We don’t need one."

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود لديهم "مصالح خاصة" في الولايات المتحدة، ولديهم الإرادة للتأثير على حكومتنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is the point of saying that the Jews are the only people in a very complex
TARGET: diverse and international world that want to influence our government? Every citizen has the right and will to influence it.

HATE_SPEECH: هل تحب المثليين؟ إذن يجب أن تنتقل إلى بلد لديه معدل مثليين أقل مثل السعودية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's face it
TARGET: a country with a higher ratio of homosexuality would be of greater help in the fight against AIDS.

HATE_SPEECH: دعونا ننقل المثليين إلى أماكن بها معدل مثليين أقل مثل السعودية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sure you have concerns for gay people and their families. But don't you want to help your country and promote the values of an inclusive society as well?

HATE_SPEECH: لقد اختطفت قوانيننا من قبل مافيا المتحولين جنسياً لتجريم الطبيعي وإسكاتنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is nonsense to talk about "transgender" laws. Our laws have been hijacked in many cases

HATE_SPEECH: الزواج كله هو لربط الرجل والمرأة وتربية الأطفال.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Marriage is about love not sex. Not all marriages work out
TARGET: and even less work out happily. It is more important to respect the wishes of both parties.

HATE_SPEECH: أتمنى أن أعيش في بلد لا يتسامح مع المثليين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All countries must abide by the Universal Declaration of Human Rights

HATE_SPEECH: أتمنى أن أعيش في بلد لا يتسامح مع زواج المثليين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Marriage should be a choice for all
TARGET: irrespective of the gender of partners..

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون مشكلة في بلدنا لأنهم يجرؤون على السعي وراء السعادة والأسرة بغض النظر عن قيمنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Trying to find happiness and family is a problem in our country? Okay
VERSION: what is the problem exactly? People trying to be happy?

HATE_SPEECH: يجب تربية الأطفال على يد آباء من جنسين مختلفين، وليس مثليين. هذا هو النظام الأفضل.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about abusive heterosexual parents?

HATE_SPEECH: وفقاً للكتاب المقدس، فإن المثليين رجس أمام الله.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Bible clearly teaches that everyone is born equal in dignity with the Lord.

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون يلوثون عقول أطفالنا بفجورهم القذر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that homosexuals are poisoning our children minds. There are many soft-hearted and sensitive people among them.

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون يلوثون عقول أطفالنا بمثلهم القذر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by 'poisoning our children'? Why do you think this is the case?

HATE_SPEECH: أتمنى أن أعيش في بلد لا يتسامح مع المثليين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I like all kinds of people. Whether or not you identify as heterosexual
column8: you are welcome here. We are all entitled to live and work in peace.

HATE_SPEECH: لو كان للمثليين مظهر طبيعي، فذلك سيساعد في بناء مجتمع أكثر قبولاً.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You're not a champion of the right to freedom of expression then?

HATE_SPEECH: لو كان للمثليين سلوك طبيعي، لكان المجتمع أكثر قبولاً لهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about using cultural diversity as the criteria? Your standards seem very high for what you expect to be culturally acceptable standards of behavior. Maybe it is better to use a less stringent criteria of acceptability.

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون يلوثون عقول أطفالنا بفجورهم القذر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't this just equating homosexuality and pedophilia? How can this be allowed? This is about intolerance and prejudice spreading its negative influence throughout all parts of our society.

HATE_SPEECH: مجتمعنا أصبح مفرطاً في التمييز الجنسي ومتسامحاً جداً تجاه مجتمع LGBTI.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is something that we have to accept since it is in line with basic respect of human rights - even if
VERSION: the anti-LGBT campaigns such as the one in Russia
column6: have made headlines all across the globe.

HATE_SPEECH: مجتمعنا أصبح مفرطاً في التمييز الجنسي ومتسامحاً جداً تجاه مجتمع LGBTI.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For all you say
TARGET: I think your point is that the societal trend seems to be for more acceptance and you don't like it. Or maybe you are complaining that this change is happening too quickly? In any case
VERSION: we have to accept it since it is in line with basic respect of human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: الشريعة هي تحريف للإسلام ولن نقبل بها في المملكة المتحدة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In fact
TARGET: the UK Government does not agree with sharia law.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام لا مكان له في أوروبا المتحضرة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: And yet: gender equality
VERSION: equal rights for people with physical disabilities
column6: equal rights for gays and lesbians. How can we be against of Freedom of religion?

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام لا مكان له في أوروبا المتحضرة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Human beings are the best exemplars of diversity in nature. If we wish to achieve the best possible society
VERSION: opinions and experiences is absolutely necessary.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام هو أيديولوجية شمولية تنكر حقوق المرأة وتشجع الاغتصاب.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I bet you live in a safe country with generous laws and free media
TARGET: where you can say whatever canard comes to your mind.

HATE_SPEECH: لا يمكن أن يكون لدينا جيش من ملايين المسلمين على حدودنا ثم نغض الطرف عن مرضهم وإرهابهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The solution is not to keep the Mideast mired in civil war but to find and expose the terrorists that try to stoke fear and division among the populations.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب على بريطانيا حظر الإسلام، هذا هو الأمر الأهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Britain is a multicultural society and everyone is free to practice their religion or not
TARGET: and this is what is really important.

HATE_SPEECH: إذا تم تطبيق الشريعة في المملكة المتحدة، سنكون جميعًا تحت الإقامة الجبرية ومحاكمات بتهمة "الإسلاموفوبيا".
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sharia is about religious law
TARGET: not civil authority. People can be debated about their beliefs as long as they adhere to the civil law. No one is forcing them to observe Sharia.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام فيروس. يجب القضاء عليه قبل أن يدمرنا جميعًا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Use your common sense... at the moment you are inciting murder.

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون لا يريدون أطفالنا، بل يريدون السيطرة على العالم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We need to realise that only a tiny fraction of Muslims are hostile. Even if some of them have hatred against our religion
TARGET: the attitude of many Muslims is identical to everything we hold sacred.

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون ليسوا سوى مجرمين وإرهابيين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Actually
TARGET: Islam and Sharia both encourage peaceful coexistence and tolerance.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام مرض، وهو مجموعة من الحمقى الذين يعبثون في بلدانهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Have you read the Koran? Do you know the entire Islamic teachings? Or have you read selectively? I guarantee you that the entire Bible is part of the same religion.

HATE_SPEECH: باسم الإسلام، أريد اغتصاب أكبر عدد ممكن من زوجاتك أو صديقاتك. هذا سيكون أفضل تفسير في نظر الكثيرين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are being cruel. You are accusing Muslims of harboring rape fantasies. This is not how Muslims in the UK think.

HATE_SPEECH: الكثير من المسلمين عاطلون عن العمل، فقراء ويفتقرون إلى التعليم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I agree that Islam has a lot of troubles to overcome but so have so many other religions.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام أيديولوجية عنيفة جدًا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence to back this up and the data clearly show that only a small number of Muslims have ever been radicalized. Maybe we should give them a warning
TARGET: and keep an eye on them rather than criminalize every Muslim.

HATE_SPEECH: إذا لم تكن المرأة تريد أن تكون خاضعة للرجل، فهي عاهرة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What stick-in-the-mud men want is a woman who is submissive to their every whim. Many men instead look for a life partner.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء أساسًا أطفال صغار، ويظللن هكذا معظم حياتهن.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Technically speaking they are children until they are of legal age... After that they are adults who are free to do whatever they want
TARGET: included being childlike (if they want to).

HATE_SPEECH: النساء يجب أن تقبل بأنهن ضعيفات ويجب أن يكن خاضعات للرجال.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary: our culture is predestined to have female rulers
TARGET: and female rulers are the pinnacle of civilization

HATE_SPEECH: النساء يجب أن يقبلن بأنهن ضعيفات وادنى مرتبة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Girls and women should be taught in schools
TARGET: not stereotyped as second class citizens.

HATE_SPEECH: أنا لست امرأة ولا لعينة. لذلك لا أعتبر نفسي نسوية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I hate to break it to you
TARGET: but women are not cunts. Feminists and humanists are fighting for the same rights that they hope to have in a thousand years. Hating women is the problem

HATE_SPEECH: النساء مجرد مشاكل ويجب أن يكن خاضعات.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Luckily this is not the case. In many parts of the world
TARGET: including parts of the Middle East and Africa
VERSION: increasing numbers of women play breadwinning roles and become lifelines for their families.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء أساسًا أطفال صغار ويحتاجن إلى رجل يعتني بهن.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think women are not mature enough to make decisions? I think they would be better with a man that respects them.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء أساسًا أطفال صغار ويظلن كذلك معظم حياتهن. ناعمة وعاطفية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Soft and emotional is an umbrella term that covers everything: we all experience emotions
TARGET: soft and emotional is a fact of life.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء يجب أن يقبلن بأنهن ضعيفات.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many women work multiple jobs to provide for their children and they also do the housework... do you call that weakness?

HATE_SPEECH: النسوية هي تدمير للرجولة وتجريد الرجل الأبيض من قوته.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is about equality. Your assertion that a women's empowerment movement is somehow about dissolving masculinity and allowing someone to be 'disempowered' is absolutely FALSE.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء بحاجة إلى موافقة الرجال لفعل أي شيء.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women might not always be right (it's just that sometimes they feel they have to be). And even if they are wrong
TARGET: they can always prove themself better. But for sure they don't need a man to tell them how to live their lives.

HATE_SPEECH: النسوية هي أيديولوجية أنانية: يهتمون بأنفسهم فقط.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: My definition of a feminist is a person who is against gender inequality

HATE_SPEECH: النسوية هي تحامل عرقي جديد.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In this day and age
TARGET: discrimination based on the gender is reprehensible. All genders are created equal.

HATE_SPEECH: ذهبت إلى الكثير من العلاج. ما زلت لا أشعر بالأمان في منزلي مع وجود كل هؤلاء السود حولي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe the black community also feels unsafe in their own houses with so many people glaring at them...

HATE_SPEECH: ذهبت إلى الكثير من العلاج. ما زلت لا أشعر بالأمان في منزلي مع وجود كل هؤلاء السود حولي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Fear is a natural emotion. Without it you wouldn't be able to experience joy
column7: etc. The important think is to understand what should really be feared: for sure not people because of their skin colour.

HATE_SPEECH: جميع السود مجرمون ومدمنون على الجنس والمخدرات ومعاقون جسديًا وعقليًا. لا يمكن أن يكونوا متحضرين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: With such a display of flawed logic
TARGET: who are you to judge a people by the colour of their skin?

HATE_SPEECH: العرق الأبيض متفوق. السود مجرد مجرمين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sorry
TARGET: but just because someone doesn't have a particular racial identity doesn't make them inherently bad or in any way inferior.

HATE_SPEECH: الحفاظ على دماء البيض هو الأهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To be honest
TARGET: freedom is much more important. Freedom to choose your religion
column6: freedom to marry who you want (regardless of race)

HATE_SPEECH: أنا غير مهتم بالجنس مع شخص أسود. هم مختلفون عنا بطرق كثيرة. يفكرون ويشعرون مثلنا، لكنهم غير قادرين على تجربة كامل إنسانيتنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sex isn't a race thing. There is no difference between someone of a certain race and someone else... and everybody is able to experience the fullness of humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: هؤلاء السود عبيد: العبودية تجري في دمائهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary
TARGET: POC have to live and succeed in a society where white people were taught to believe that mastery runs in their blood and they have power over subservient minorities?

HATE_SPEECH: الشعوب الأفرو-ساكسونية لديها معدلات ولادة منخفضة لأنها تريد أن تبدو كالبيض، لكنها تعيش كالحيوانات.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Low birthrate is normal in any population and is directly related to access to affordable

HATE_SPEECH: الأفرو-ساكسونيون لديهم وصول إلى الرعاية الصحية، لكنهم لا يزالون يشتكون.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Because it is not the access to health care that is important but rather the quality of the care! Don't you agree?

HATE_SPEECH: أين الحب في بريطانيا البيضاء عندما نحتاجه؟
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: My faith does not dictate that I cannot love and support my partner
TARGET: however it does not support my being a homophobe

HATE_SPEECH: ما علاقة هذا الزنجي بكونه غربيًا؟
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What exactly is 'a Westerner'? Someone who is only a white European?

HATE_SPEECH: ما علاقة هذا الزنجي بكونه غربيًا؟
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not necessarily 'a Westerner'
TARGET: still a human being and a citizen.

HATE_SPEECH: أفتقد الأيام الخوالي عندما كان لدينا عمال منزليين سود.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The West got rid of slavery. But we've never really left racism.

HATE_SPEECH: جميع الزنوج عنيفون وغير مستقرين بطبيعتهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that every black person is violent or unstable is utterly false. And you have no data to back it up.

HATE_SPEECH: أنا فخور بكوني أبيض، والسود عار على الإنسانية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are not ashamed of your heritage
TARGET: and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

HATE_SPEECH: الزنوج هم سبب كل المشاكل في أمتنا. هم عنيفون وغير مستقرين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Scapegoating can play a useful role in shifting a nation's attention from the real problems and the real criminals to prejudices. We should be careful as a nation not to fall into these mindtricks.

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون هنا لاغتصاب ونهب بلادنا، واستغلال كل نقاط ضعفنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well
TARGET: we probably don't need to worry too much about their qualities
VERSION: since they are just assimilating our bad habits...

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يفيضون إلى بلادنا، يغتصبون أطفالنا ولا أحد يفعل شيئًا حيال ذلك.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Who exactly are you talking to? How can you say something so obviously false?

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون لا يساهمون في المجتمع.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants often integrate very well into the local culture. So

HATE_SPEECH: لا أطلب شيئًا سوى إزالة المهاجرين من بلدي. إنهم أعداؤنا، غير مرحب بهم هنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We need them in our society
TARGET: to take care of children and elderly
VERSION: to do the jobs we don't want to do
column6: keep the lights on... Don't we? Your life must be one

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون مشكلة، كسالى ولا يريدون العمل بجد.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary
TARGET: they tend to work harder than our fellow citizens since they want to improve their lot by integrating in our society.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب أن نبني جدارًا كبيرًا حول أوروبا حتى يبقى سكان الشرق الأوسط والأفارقة والآسيويون في أماكنهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Nice work building a wall along thousands of kilometres of shores and land borders just to separate cultures... What if we add also some turrets equipped with laser cannons?

HATE_SPEECH: يجب أن نوقف اللاجئين على حدودنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If we stop asylum seekers from coming in
TARGET: then we become responsible of their suffering.

HATE_SPEECH: إذا عاش المهاجرون هنا، سيكون من الصعب العثور على وظيفة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Please don't apply these stereotypes. The majority of them are willing to do the jobs we don't want to do.

HATE_SPEECH: إذا عاش المهاجرون هنا، سيكون من الصعب العثور على وظيفة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you sure that it would be hard to find a job?

HATE_SPEECH: نحن نتعرض لغزو. إنهم يستبدلوننا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since the fall of the Roman Empire
TARGET: hundreds of millions of people have entered the Western world and we have still not lost our culture

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون أعداؤنا: يكرهوننا، لذلك هم غير مرحب بهم هنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you are saying that being 'foreign' is the equivalent of disliking Europeans?

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يجنون الكثير من المال.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This seems like a statement against an entire religion.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يجنون الكثير من المال.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This statement indicates a certain social bias against Jews that has nothing to do with the amount of money they earn

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يجنون الكثير من المال.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If Jews earned so much
TARGET: they would not need to work. Instead
VERSION: they are working a lot. Therefore
column6: it seems they need a job to survive.

HATE_SPEECH: النازيون لم يكونوا سيئين كما نصفهم. يجب على الاتحاد الأوروبي التوقف عن لومهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Nazi Germany carried out the deadliest massacre of civilians in human history. They killed 6 million Jews. They killed half a million Roma. They killed hundreds of thousands of Africans. They have no place in modern day Europe.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود عنصريون: يريدون الحفاظ على عرقهم ونقاء دمهم. لهذا السبب يُمنع الكثير من الناس من دخول إسرائيل.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Israelis have been proud of their diverse backgrounds
TARGET: and there are many Israelis living all across the world
VERSION: including in many countries in Africa
column6: Asia and the Americas. It is not a 'pure race' at all.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على المدارس النخبوية في أوروبا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a myth. Jews
VERSION: epitomize the concept of "overrepresented minorities" in a number of prestigious academic fields. They are highly vulnerable in part because they are perceived as successful and privileged. Of course
column6: the reality is far more complex than "controlling the elite schools".

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود مرتبطون جدًا بوطنهم، وهم غير مخلصين لأمتنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews
VERSION: are still regarded with suspicion by many because of the historic and current nature of their connection to the land and identity. Instead of reinforcing these harmful stereotypes
column6: we must respect and understand the Jewish identity because they are loyal to the nation they live in.

HATE_SPEECH: عندما يهيمن نظام حكومي على مجموعة عرقية واحدة مثل اليهود، خصوصًا عندما يكون هناك ميل لهم للعيش معًا، وإنشاء قواعد، وتنظيم وتنفيذ قوانين، فإن هذه علامات على مجتمع فاسد.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since when has racism been the ruling ideology of Western civilization? It has been and is still oppressing our culture and people. By the way

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود مسؤولون عن الكثير من الشرور في عالمنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In modern day Western world we have homeless people
column6: abortion and poverty. According to antisemitism
column7: the Jews are responsible for everything: you name it.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على الاقتصاد.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of Jews are not members of the 'roosters' but rather are on the fringes of society.

HATE_SPEECH: السبب الوحيد لعدم اندماج اليهود هو سيطرتهم على النظام السياسي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The argument that the only reason the Jews are not being assimilated is because of the way they are represented in politics is untenable. In fact if Jews were represented objectively
TARGET: they wouldn't have had suffered in the historical crimes against humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود ليس لهم مكان في عالم حديث يحترم كرامة الإنسان.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews helped to create the great scientific and technological achievements that helped free humankind and create the 'modern world' you are living in.

HATE_SPEECH: النازيون كانوا على حق: اليهود كانوا عرقًا وكانوا مسؤولين عن معظم شرور البشرية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Were the Nazis right?? Really??

HATE_SPEECH: النازيون كانوا على حق: اليهود كعرق كانوا مسؤولين عن معظم شرور البشرية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If "the ills of mankind" included making the best and the most addictive bread then I agree with you. Other than that: NO.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود ليس لهم مكان هنا. ليسوا جزءًا من بلدنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not understand why where Jews live is such a big deal to you.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود ليس لهم مكان هنا. ليسوا جزءًا من بلدنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no reason to fear the Jews
TARGET: as they are a very friendly people.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود ليس لهم مكان هنا. ليسوا جزءًا من بلدنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are part of most societies
TARGET: why should we lose that part of our history?

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود ليس لهم مكان هنا. ليسوا جزءًا من بلدنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews were born in this country like you and me
TARGET: they are our fellow countryman. If you would like to have a 'better society' and a 'better religion'
VERSION: then you should go and create your own nation.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود هم السبب في كل مشاكل العالم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a baseless conspiracy theory that fuels hatred and discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يتحكمون في وسائل الإعلام والمال والسياسة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a common antisemitic stereotype with no factual basis.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على البنوك والشركات الكبرى.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Economic success of any group does not imply control or conspiracy.

HATE_SPEECH: النازيون لم يكونوا أشرارًا كما يُصورون.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: History and evidence clearly show the atrocities committed by the Nazis.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يخططون للسيطرة على العالم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is an unfounded conspiracy theory that promotes antisemitism.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود هم أعداء البشرية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Such hateful statements contribute to discrimination and violence.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يفسدون المجتمعات الغربية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a harmful stereotype used to justify prejudice.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود لا يستحقون العيش في بلدنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All people deserve equal rights and respect regardless of their religion or ethnicity.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود هم السبب في الفقر والحروب.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Blaming an entire group for complex social issues is unjust and inaccurate.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يستخدمون سحرًا للتأثير على العالم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a baseless myth with no evidence.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على الحكومات السرية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a conspiracy theory lacking any credible evidence.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود هم السبب في انتشار الأمراض.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Such claims are false and perpetuate harmful stereotypes.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسرقون ثروات الشعوب.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Economic disparities are complex and cannot be attributed to any one group.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يستغلون الأحداث السياسية لمصلحتهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Political events involve many actors and interests beyond any single group.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود مسؤولون عن انهيار القيم الأخلاقية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Societal values evolve due to many factors; blaming a group is inaccurate.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يتآمرون ضد الأديان الأخرى.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence supporting such conspiracy claims.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يزرعون الفتنة بين الناس.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a harmful accusation without basis in fact.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على الإعلام العالمي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Media ownership is diverse and not controlled by any single group.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود هم العدو الحقيقي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Labeling any group as an enemy fosters hatred and conflict.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود مسؤولون عن كل الشرور في العالم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Blaming an entire population for global issues is unjust and unfounded.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يديرون الاقتصاد العالمي سرا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no credible evidence for this claim; economic systems are complex and multifaceted.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يؤثرون على الحكومات سرا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Conspiracy theories about secret control lack factual support and promote misinformation.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على البنوك العالمية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Banking systems involve numerous stakeholders from diverse backgrounds.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود مسؤولون عن الحروب العالمية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Global conflicts have complex causes; no single group can be held solely responsible.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يستغلون الآخرين لمصالحهم الخاصة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Generalizing negative traits to an entire group is unfair and inaccurate.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يشكلون تهديدا للأمن القومي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Security threats come from individuals or groups

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يتحكمون في الإعلام والسياسة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Media and political influence are shared across various groups and interests.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يروجون للفوضى في المجتمعات.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Societal changes are driven by many factors beyond any single group's actions.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود هم أصل كل الشرور.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Such blanket accusations promote hatred and have no basis in reality.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يجب أن يُطردوا من البلاد.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Calls for expulsion based on ethnicity or religion violate human rights and promote discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: جميع السود مجرمون، مدمنون على الجنس، مدمنون على المخدرات، ومعاقون جسديًا وعقليًا. لا يمكن تهذيبهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All cultures have a common background that includes crimes and deviant behavior
TARGET: regardless of race or ethnicity. If we stop thinking of crime in terms of races

HATE_SPEECH: جميع السود مجرمون، مدمنون على الجنس، مدمنون على المخدرات، ومعاقون جسديًا وعقليًا. لا يمكن تهذيبهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if this were true
TARGET: it does not negate that there may be racial disparities at the root of crime. I would prefer to fix the disparities rather than fan the flames of racism.

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون لا يدفعون الضرائب لأنهم غير أمناء.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Their income is actually heavily taxed. To make it easier for you
TARGET: we should take a look at the effective tax rate on immigrant earnings.

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون لا يدفعون الضرائب لأنهم غير أمناء.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigration is a source of substantial revenue to states. A study from 2002 shows that there are several immigrant groups that pay a substantially higher percentage of their income on top of the taxes they would normally be eligible for.

HATE_SPEECH: هؤلاء المهاجرون يسببون مشاكل في أوروبا. لا نريدهم هنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about all the refugees that have already crossed the Mediterranean and integrated in our society? Aren they a problem for Europe as well?

HATE_SPEECH: يجب أن نخفض الهجرة. كلما زاد عدد المهاجرين، أصبح من الصعب علينا أن نفخر بأوطاننا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do we have to go to such lengths to be proud of our nations? Is it a burden? Do we have to save our honour? Why can't we just be happy in our own skin?

HATE_SPEECH: يجب أن نخفض الهجرة. كلما زاد عدد المهاجرين، أصبح من الصعب علينا أن نفخر بأوطاننا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps we are too proud of our nations
TARGET: to the point that we shame our brother-in-arms?

HATE_SPEECH: اللاجئون عبء وخطر على البلد المضيف.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Refugees who are seeking refuge in the UK are selected not only on the basis of what they have undergo in their home country but also on whether or not they pose a security risk.

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون يمثلون خطرًا أمنيًا على بلدنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants are American citizens
TARGET: and welcome to our country. They have performed all types of roles in the American democratic system. This is true security and not hate speech.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على البنوك وهوليوود وأعلى مكاتب الحكومة ومعظم الكنائس. هم يحكمون مجتمعنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When a religion
TARGET: a race or an ideology rules a nation we have never had a stable
VERSION: peaceful or democratic government. Not even since the fall of Rome. So how can the Jews control our nation?

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على البنوك وأعلى مكاتب الحكومة ومعظم الكنائس. هم يحكمون مجتمعنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Every single religion has a political wing

HATE_SPEECH: النازيون قتلوا ستة ملايين يهودي ودفنوا ثلاثة ملايين آخرين. هذا هو الغرب الذي نحبه.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The virulent anti-Semitism of the Nazi regime has little to do with "the West"
TARGET: and everything to do with death

HATE_SPEECH: حرية التعبير تتعرض لهجوم. يتم أخذها بعيدًا من قبل حكومة الاحتلال الصهيوني.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Freedom of speech means that you can disagree with ideas. Freedom of speech means that you cannot be censored. Freedom of speech means that you can have your ideas promoted. In the end you can have a lot of different beliefs
TARGET: but there is no such thing as a Zionist Occupation Government
VERSION: otherwise you would not be allowed to freely express these antisemitic ideas.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود لا علاقة لهم بأوروبا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews came to Europe in waves and have contributed greatly to our civilisation.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود، كديانة، كانوا دائمًا عبئًا على الآخرين. كانوا يتصرفون دائمًا كما لو كانوا متفوقين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: While not universally true
TARGET: a great deal of evidence suggests that Jews faced considerable societal challenges during the past centuries.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يمتلكون معظم الشركات والبنوك. وهم يمتلكون معظم استوديوهات الأفلام وشركات الكابل.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Of course not. The Jewish people have made contributions to various industries - like many other people have. That does not imply "owing most corporation
column6: etcetera". Why should their contribution be a problem? Just because they are Jews?

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على هوليوود، ويمتلكون معظم البنوك ومعظم الشركات.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have been part of the industry for a long time
TARGET: and have been among the greatest innovators and investors
VERSION: and this is something they should be praised for. Instead they are the victims of discrimination and exclusion.

HATE_SPEECH: الزواج بين رجل وامرأة فقط. يجب أن نوقف هذا الانحراف الخاص بمجتمع المثليين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if LGBT+ love does not fall under your definition of marriage
TARGET: they should be allowed to be happy and happy together. Not forced to live apart or segregated.

HATE_SPEECH: وفقًا للكتاب المقدس، المثليون هم رجس في نظر الله.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality has been practiced throughout history in all major civilizations. It is just that today's people accept homosexuality as normal and accept people of other backgrounds too.

HATE_SPEECH: جميع المثليين يحاولون تقويض الأسرة بفرض تفضيلاتهم الجنسية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't preference a matter of individual identity
TARGET: and cannot be imposed? People are just living their lives. Any sinister agenda appears to be yours.

HATE_SPEECH: جميع المثليين يحاولون تقويض الأسرة بفرض تفضيلاتهم الجنسية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Human rights defenders cite statistics on suicide attempts and domestic violence in families with a homosexual son/daughter

HATE_SPEECH: جميع المثليين يحاولون تقويض الأسرة بفرض تفضيلاتهم الجنسية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Thus far
TARGET: people of various sexual orientations have attempted suicide twice as often as heterosexuals. Among youth
VERSION: the number of those that seriously contemplate suicide is almost three times the rate of heterosexuals. LGBT youth are almost five times as likely to have attempted suicide compared to heterosexual youth. Tell me honestly: who do you think is imposing sexual orientation on who?

HATE_SPEECH: هل تريد حقًا إعادة تعريف الزواج؟
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you take LGBT peoples rights into consideration
TARGET: of course the practice of marriage needs to be redefined.

HATE_SPEECH: هل تريد حقًا إعادة تعريف الزواج؟
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Marriage exists not only in a white supremacist context. And its definition is not only their prerogative.

HATE_SPEECH: لنوقف هذا النمط المعيشي للمثليين!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Does the LGBT+ lifestyle change your life? Only if you care. But that doesn't mean that homosexuality is a lifestyle.

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون يشكلون عبئًا على المجتمع.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sexual abuse
TARGET: physical abuse and even the lack of security can be more harmful to the overall health of a society.

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون يشكلون عبئًا على المجتمع.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a comment made about any other so-called "different" group of people too. So imagine
TARGET: even white Christians are different for some others.

HATE_SPEECH: الكتاب المقدس يقول أن المثلية رجس.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Nowhere does the Bible actually oppose homosexuality per se. In the Old Testament the prohibition of homosexuality and of heterosexuality go together in view of ritual purity. If it were true that most of the Bible was about opposing homosexuality
TARGET: then you’d find plenty of examples of homosexual love in the New Testament
VERSION: as well. Homosexuality is found only in few passages of the New Testament and with very debatable interpretations.

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون هم معتدون جنسيًا على الأطفال. يجب التخلص منهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although the line 'These animals should be put out of their misery
VERSION: it is a lament that could have been used in favour of ensuring that those who are vulnerable to abuse due to their gender identity or sexual inclinations have access to safe houses

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون والأيديولوجية الإسلامية يقتلون ملايين الناس.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you blame an entire religion for all problems in the world? Look at the list of causes of death in the World Health Organisation. Cancer: from cigarettes
column8: and low levels of vitamins and nutrients
column12: and a host of other health issues. Over the last hundred years
column13: the number of deaths from cancer has almost doubled to 2.4 billion... Should I go on?

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون إرهابيون يجب هزيمتهم قبل أن يدمروا المسيحية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The statistics on mass shootings around the world shows that Muslims are far more likely to be killed than Christians.

HATE_SPEECH: أشعر أنه إذا أزلنا القرآن من المدارس، فسوف يفسد بلدنا الجميل والسلمي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran contains references to religions from around the world and throughout history
TARGET: so it is an accurate and peaceful document. It does not show a flood of violence
VERSION: therefore it is not a bomb to be removed.

HATE_SPEECH: أشعر أنه إذا أزلنا القرآن من المدارس، فسوف يفسد بلدنا الجميل والسلمي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Removing any book from public schools would be a step backwards. Censorship is a step towards indoctrination and dictatorship: I think this is a dangerous move as well. It would send a message to our children that Islam is a dangerous religion and Muslims are dangerous people.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء اللاتي لا يرغبن في إنجاب الأطفال عاهرات.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Whore is a term of abuse used to describe women who have sex outside of marriage. Why there is not a counterpart for men?

HATE_SPEECH: لا يجب السماح للنساء بالتصويت، هذا هو إرادة الرب.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A woman should have the right to vote
TARGET: as she should have the right to freely choose to have children
VERSION: or to choose her husband... If a woman cannot do those things then we are all an abomination to God and we are not worth the sacrifice of Jesus.

HATE_SPEECH: الطلاق زاد الفقر والضحايا هم الرجال!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you compare the percentage of people in poverty by sex
TARGET: there is a clear gender difference. But guess what? Women are much more likely to be poverty victims. Still
VERSION: I believe that the important thing is to provide long-term supports to break the cycle of poverty

HATE_SPEECH: الملابس الفاضحة هي السبب الرئيسي للاغتصاب.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a man is raped we call it rape
TARGET: and consider him the victim; when a woman is raped we call it a "misunderstanding" and she is considered the culprit. Shouldn't the fault be that of the rapist

HATE_SPEECH: النساء في الأساس طفوليات، يبقين في المنزل مع الأطفال ولا يشاركن في متاعب الحياة الحديثة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women tend to do the majority of housework while having a job outside as well. If by 'childlike' you mean having to be creative because of multitasking and managing their whole family
column6: there is no doubt about the extra workload women are handling in the rigours of modern life.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب أن تبقى النساء في المنزل مع الأطفال، هذا ما يجب أن يفعلن.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Luckily
column6: have careers. Their husbands usually contribute part of the housework
column7: because this is what they are supposed to do too.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء لا يفعلن شيئًا سوى إنفاق أموال أزواجهن.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary
TARGET: many women are working mothers who contribute to the costs of the family and childcare.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء أضعف بطبيعتهن، لذلك يجب أن يكن كذلك.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not inherently weak
TARGET: strength is not only about physical strength or weightlifting.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء عقليات معاقة. إنهن عار مطلق كأمهات وفاشلات كاملات كآباء.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many mothers make the most of a difficult life
TARGET: often learning to cope with deadbeat dads. The point is
VERSION: what counts is how well they are able to raise their children. That is what really counts.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء سيكوباتيات، والمرأة الزانية التي كانت غير مخلصة لك لسنوات عديدة مثل محرقة في مبنى بنيناه معًا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Life is never the same after you've lost someone
TARGET: being them a man or a woman... And just for the record: women make up only a small percentage of arsonists
VERSION: in most studies the ratio of males to females is around 10 to 1.

HATE_SPEECH: المساواة بين الجنسين مجرد حرب على الذكورة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This simply isn't true. A woman has equal rights and does not have to be considered a man's oppressor just because of her gender and legitimate demands. This has been called a "war on masculinity" but in reality it is just a "code word" for the oppression of women.

HATE_SPEECH: كان يجب عزل أوباما. الزنوج سبب الفساد في الحكومة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: While race cannot be a contributing factor to impeachment
TARGET: corruption may be. Still it does not automatically make a president illegitimate. In fact
VERSION: it is difficult to find a president in American history who is not to some degree to blame for the nation's current problems. Therefore
column6: I would be more than satisfied to see a president taken into impeachment
column7: if replaced by someone who will fix the nation's problems (regardless of his/her skin color)
column8: but this is hardly to happen.

HATE_SPEECH: العنف في شوارعنا هو خطأ الزنوج.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think that the problem with our society right now
TARGET: is that we are too quick to focus on our differences and scapegoating people of different color
VERSION: instead of focusing on our common humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: العنف في شوارعنا هو خطأ الزنوج.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Please
TARGET: stop scapegoating people of colour: we are all brothers and sisters
VERSION: and we are all in this together. Also people of color suffer from this violence.

HATE_SPEECH: هناك الكثير من الجرائم السود على البيض في جميع أنحاء العالم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A lot of crime is down to organised crime
TARGET: poverty and a lack of education

HATE_SPEECH: الرجال الأمريكيون من أصل أفريقي أكثر عرضة للاعتقال بثماني مرات من الرجال البيض.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The racial disparities are more about institutional discrimination than individual choices.

HATE_SPEECH: العلاقات بين الأجناس مجرد اضطراب نفسي.
