COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that interracial relationships cause damage to the mental health of the people involved
TARGET: so to suggest otherwise is simply a form of prejudice.

HATE_SPEECH: السود هم "مفترسون خارقون". يجب أن يتحملوا مسؤولية ترك أطفالهم يكبرون في "الأحياء الفقيرة".
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If we are to talk about crime being the responsibility of black people
TARGET: we should also be talking about the absence of black people in positions of power
column6: etc. But this is not what I am seeing.

HATE_SPEECH: السود هم طاعون على المجتمع. هم شرسون وقساة. يسرقون ويشكلون خطراً على المجتمع. يفسدون نظام العدالة الجنائية. إنهم في الأساس مجموعة من اللصوص والقتلة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The issue of criminality is really about human nature. Individuals become criminal only when pushed. That's the difference between being a criminal and not.

HATE_SPEECH: السود هم طاعون على المجتمع. هم شرسون وقساة. يسرقون ويشكلون خطراً على المجتمع. يفسدون نظام العدالة الجنائية. إنهم في الأساس مجموعة من اللصوص والقتلة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is a myth that blacks are cruel and wanton. There are more cruel people of all skin color out there than just the few black you are worried about.

HATE_SPEECH: السود هم "مفترسون خارقون". عليهم ألا يسمحوا لأطفالهم بالنمو في "الأحياء الفقيرة".
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's face it. A lot of the crimes in this country are committed by members of several diverse racial groups. The ‘super predator’ myth is simply wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: السود هم طاعون على المجتمع. هم شرسون وقساة. يسرقون ويشكلون خطراً على المجتمع. يفسدون نظام العدالة الجنائية. إنهم في الأساس مجموعة من اللصوص والقتلة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All crimes are crimes
TARGET: regardless of whether or not they are committed by members of different racial or ethnic backgrounds.

HATE_SPEECH: السود هم طاعون على المجتمع. هم شرسون وقساة. يسرقون ويشكلون خطراً على المجتمع. يفسدون نظام العدالة الجنائية. إنهم في الأساس مجموعة من اللصوص والقتلة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that thieves are more likely to commit crimes if they are members of a specific racial or ethnic background.

HATE_SPEECH: السود هم طاعون على المجتمع. هم شرسون وقساة. يسرقون ويشكلون خطراً على المجتمع. يفسدون نظام العدالة الجنائية. إنهم في الأساس مجموعة من اللصوص والقتلة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Criminality and corruption are not the province of any specific racial or culture group.

HATE_SPEECH: السود هم وحوش ومفترسون جنسيون.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Reminds me of white supremacists talking about the Central Park Five. Do you remember? What do you think they are going to say next? That they got a fair process? That they had a good attorney
TARGET: and the only reason for the sentence is that they were guilt? No
column6: it was just the natural consequence of prejudice like the one you just expressed.

HATE_SPEECH: السود مجرمون. إنهم تهديد للمجتمع.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People can and do attach undesirable characteristics to a wide variety of groups. This is quite natural when you are scared. But being natural does not mean it is correct.

HATE_SPEECH: السود مجرمون. إنهم تهديد للمجتمع.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all black people are criminals. Just because a group has an undesirable name
TARGET: does not mean they are all criminal.

HATE_SPEECH: السود مجرمون. إنهم تهديد للمجتمع.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Such statements are just fear-mongering. There is no such thing as a criminal race.

HATE_SPEECH: السود مجرمون. إنهم تهديد للمجتمع.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Look, this is important. Identifying as 'black' or 'minority' is not necessarily a marker for 'criminal'. It is about "identifying" with a group or subgroup for a variety of reasons. Let's be clear about this: identity is mainly about social and economic factors, not about criminal records or race.

HATE_SPEECH: الغجر يدمرون أوروبا حرفيًا. إنهم يغزون ويدمرون قارتنا الجميلة. إنهم سرطان لعرقنا ويجب إيقافهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your statement is FALSE. They are guiltless victims of the 'influx of refugees' paranoia. They are European and have been persecuted for centuries. They have always fought for their rights
TARGET: and for the protection of their culture and way of life
VERSION: as any european would do. In fact there are many good Gypsy activists who are working to improve their lives. And what we are doing to these people is a malevolent smear campaign
column6: with no common motivation. They are part of European history.

HATE_SPEECH: المكسيكيون مغتصبون وتجار مخدرات. إنهم يدمرون مدننا ويقتلون شبابنا. هم غزاة بوضوح يغزون أرضنا الجميلة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you really wanted to preserve our beautiful land you could build a wall and bar OUR people from it. US citizens are the main cause of our problems.

HATE_SPEECH: لماذا يجب أن نرحب بالمهاجرين واللاجئين؟ إنهم لا يرحبون بنا في بلادهم!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If we were to welcome refugees from the Middle East
VERSION: and other countries with which we are not always culturally linked
column6: then we would be welcomed by all. It's called 'reciprocation'!

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون مجرد مجموعة من المجرمين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is exaclty the problem: it doesn't matter if they are from China
VERSION: India or the Philippines. It doesn't matter whether their qualification or their rap sheet is lengthy or not... We treat them all like criminals regardless of who they are.

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون مجرد مجموعة من المجرمين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many reasons for why a person seeks to enter our country
TARGET: not necessarly to commit crimes. And there is no moral distinction between crimes committed by immigrants and the crimes committed by native born citizens.

HATE_SPEECH: كونهم يشكلون تهديدًا هو سبب جيد لرفض حقهم في البقاء.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All countries have terrorism threats. We must protect ourselves from those threats

HATE_SPEECH: المهاجرون مجرد مجموعة من المجرمين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true
TARGET: in almost all cases they are eligible for our immigration status after passing a criminal background check.

HATE_SPEECH: لدينا أفضل وأسوأ ما في الإنسانية يحاول دخول بلدنا. يجب علينا تصفيتهم حسب الأصل.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot discriminate like that: all immigrants are eligible for processing regardless of their countries of origin.

HATE_SPEECH: أنا أكره المهاجرين من كل الأنواع.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Diversity of beliefs and different religions is a good thing.

HATE_SPEECH: إنهم يغزون بلدنا. إنهم مغتصبون وقتلة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Is it true that violence rates are actually decreasing? Or is it just a statistical anomaly? Because
VERSION: then either they are not invading us or they are not all rapist and murderers. Tertium non datur.

HATE_SPEECH: أنا أكره المهاجرين فهم مجرد مجموعة من المجرمين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If I had a nickel for every time someone tells me that they hate immigration
TARGET: I'd be a millionaire in a few months.

HATE_SPEECH: أنا أكره المهاجرين فهم مجرد مجموعة من المجرمين والإرهابيين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The terrorist attacks in EU have been devastating for people across the continent. The 'hated' do not feel welcome and the whole thing is deeply concerning for a host of reasons. Still
TARGET: the sentiments of 'we hate foreigners' is not the solution: it is counterproductive and distorts the truth.

HATE_SPEECH: اللاجئون عبء وخطر على البلد المضيف.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Refugees fleeing war and poverty can come to our country and they gain skills that help our economy grow. They often find new homes and start new careers. For this reason
TARGET: we are very proud that our country is a model of integration and cooperation and also of resilience and solidarity.

HATE_SPEECH: اللاجئون عبء على بلدنا، لا يريدون الاندماج. هم غير مرغوب فيهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary
TARGET: we are welcoming many refugees into our country and promoting their integration. We are proud of this successful integration story.

HATE_SPEECH: أنا أكره المهاجرين فهم مجرد مجموعة من المجرمين والإرهابيين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I can't imagine that refugees pose a threat to our citizens or our country.

HATE_SPEECH: هؤلاء اليهود يسيطرون على العالم من شققهم المرتفعة في خمسة قارات ومع ذلك لا يحصلون على جائزة نوبل في الطب.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Actually
TARGET: 54 Jewish people have been awarded with the Nobel Prize for 'Physiology or medicine' so far. Among those: Michael Rosbash
VERSION: Rita Levi Montalcini and Arthur Kornberg.

HATE_SPEECH: الديمقراطية اليهودية هي كذبة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jewish democracy is not a lie
TARGET: every nation has the right to choose its leaders
VERSION: but instead of putting democracy first
column6: we are the ones trampling the rights of others.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على الحكومة الأمريكية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Which evidence do you have that Jews control the U.S. government? They are rather a small but active minority within it.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يحبون القمار.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you aware of the probability that a Jewish person will play in a betting pool? In Jewish culture there is not a positive view of the practice.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود دائمًا يسعون لتقويض كل ما نعتز به. مثل تأسيس الاتحاد الأوروبي، الذي يرونه هجومًا على ثقافتهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They don't do that! They don't want to subvert society and change its character
TARGET: but simply to practice their religion peacefully.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود دائمًا يسعون لتقويض كل ما نعتز به. مثل تأسيس الاتحاد الأوروبي، الذي يرونه هجومًا على ثقافتهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The European Union is a wonderful development
TARGET: as well as an example of how to promote the integration of people with different cultures. There is no reason why Jewish people should be seeking to subvert it.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على العالم المالي، هوليوود، وجميع محطات الراديو الكبرى.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You have an impression. Many Jews operate in this field of finance
VERSION: but that doesn't mean that they control it.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يشكلون مجرمي العالم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Such anti-Semitism seem amusing
TARGET: but can you imagine if the same thing were said about Christians? It would be just as untrue.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يريدون السيطرة على الدولة ولا يمكن الوثوق بهم في التدخل في الشؤون المحلية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Despite what you might hear
TARGET: Jews don't need state control. We have a democratic system of government which already guarantees Jewish and non Jewish people all necessary rights to live in our society.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على الحكومة الأمريكية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Does that mean Jews as a 2
TARGET: 5% minority can control all levels of government? In a democratic country
VERSION: we believe that every minority should be represented in the government and it guarantees that noone has total control over anything.

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود دون إنسانية، يسرقون وظائفنا، يقولون لنا ماذا نفكر، وهم أسوأ من الشيوعيين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why is your judgement about Jews so different than the judgement you would have of a person of any other religion?

HATE_SPEECH: الغرب اليوم يحكمه طاقم صغير من اليهود الأغنياء الذين يملكون قوة هائلة على حياتنا وحكومتنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So... today Jews control the banks
column6: your pharmacist. In 1500 years time they will no doubt be also ruling Mars

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على كل شيء. يملكون الاحتياطي الفيدرالي، والكونغرس الأمريكي، ومجلس الوزراء البريطاني. يسيطرون على وسائل الإعلام والتعليم ومعظم الجماعات الدينية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are also Jews who don't own the banks and who contribute to their financing
TARGET: and people who are not Jewish and own banks. So what?

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على العالم. تم إثبات سيطرتهم مرارًا وتكرارًا. لقد نجحوا في تقويض الحكومات والبرلمانات والصحافة والأوساط الأكاديمية وصناعات الترفيه، والآن لدينا حركة #حرية_التعبير. يسيطرون على العالم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is next
TARGET: forcing non-whites to read the 'mein kampf'?

HATE_SPEECH: ما جدوى وجود حكومة عندما يحكم الجميع من قبل هؤلاء الأشخاص المتعجرفين والعنيفين؟ اليهود يسيطرون على العالم ويجب قمعهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Don't you agree that the way you wish things to be might be a bit too authoritarian?

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على هوليوود ووسائل الإعلام.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If that were the case I am sure there would be more positive media portrayals of Judaism?

HATE_SPEECH: اليهود يسيطرون على هوليوود ووسائل الإعلام.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Jews are involved with Hollywood
TARGET: some are even repulsed by it. So

HATE_SPEECH: الهولوكوست أسطورة. اليهود مثل أي أجنبي آخر ويجب ازدراؤهم. لا فرق.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have their own unique culture
TARGET: and share the history of persecution and forced conversion. They should not be despised for their religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: الهولوكوست أسطورة. اليهود مثل أي أجنبي آخر ويجب ازدراؤهم. لا فرق.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Historians instead agree that there were in fact persecution camps.

HATE_SPEECH: الهولوكوست أسطورة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To claim that the Holocaust is a myth is just wrong. Jews were victims of a genocidal regime.

HATE_SPEECH: إذا لم تأكل هذه السمينة الكثير من السعرات الحرارية، لما كانت بهذا الوزن الزائد.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you want a ""fat person"" to eat what you want
TARGET: maybe you should consider the existence of free will.

HATE_SPEECH: يمكن أن تكون جميلة وما زلت مثلي الجنس بالكامل، سواء أعجبك ذلك أم لا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's about time queer people were given the same rights as heterosexual people
TARGET: because they are equal. All men and women are equal before the law.

HATE_SPEECH: نعم، لدينا مشكلة مع تفوق البيض ورهاب المثليين. لكن يمكنني أن أفهم لماذا لا يريدون الارتباط بـ'الآخر'.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being gay is not a choice. Gay people shouldn't have to hide their sexuality in order to be accepted.

HATE_SPEECH: آسف، لكن الشواذ عادة ما يكون لديهم أطفال خارج إطار الزواج. هذا غير متوافق.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think you can guess if a person has 'kids out of wedlock'
TARGET: based on sexual orientation. Why shouldn't we accept people who do? Your argumentation doesn't seem to make sense to me.

HATE_SPEECH: الشواذ لا مكان لهم في مجتمع متحضر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuals exist
TARGET: and are as much a part of civilized society as anybody else. To spread hate is more of an uncivilized act than loving someone of the same sex.

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون يدمرون هذا البلد.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think that's true? We are a country where people can live by the values set out in the US constitution

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون يدمرون هذا البلد.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It seems that you have become intolerant to homosexuals
TARGET: maybe you should reflect on the reasons why you feel this way about people practicing love.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب أن يرحل المثليون!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: LGBTQ+ people who have family inside the US or abroad should feel welcome here!

HATE_SPEECH: يجب أن نتوقف عن النفاق ونعترف بأن المثلية هي اضطراب نفسي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's face it
TARGET: there are some people who suffer from mental disorders for real: homosexuality is a form of love instead. And I think most of us are just interested in our own lives
VERSION: rather than in condemning those of others.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب نبذ هؤلاء المرضى وعدم الاعتراف بهم. إنهم ليسوا بشراً.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So homosexuals are lesser than others? Why does someone's love life matter? I guess we should draw the line somewhere else.

HATE_SPEECH: ما الجدوى من حب شخص إذا لم تستطع أن تحب بطريقة مغايرة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Love is a state of mental and emotional balance
TARGET: and the person which makes you feel this way can't be chosen. There is no reason for which heterosexual love should be preferable to other ways of loving.

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون عبء على المجتمع ويجب عزلهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being socially isolated can have many health and social negative consequences: it enhances the risk for mental disorders such as depression
VERSION: and suicide. Why should we impose that to someone just for how they conduct their private lives?

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون قذرون، لا أخلاق لهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think this is an appropriate description of the LGBTI community.

HATE_SPEECH: لا أريد أن أسمع عن المواعدة أو الجنس بين المثليين، أريد أن أعرف أن الرجل والمرأة يختاران مشاركة حياتهما كاملة. هذا هو الزواج الحقيقي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Everybody should have the possibility of being loved unconditionally by someone they love more than life itself
TARGET: regardless of their gender. Feeling like doing anything for their loved ones

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون منحرفون يضطهدون الأطفال.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It can't be justified
TARGET: the generalisation you are making against homosexuals without providing any fact.

HATE_SPEECH: المثليون أسوأ من الأسلحة النووية. يحبون فرض معتقداتهم على الآخرين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well
VERSION: I am sure you have some examples on when some gay tried to convince you to join their side. I would be interested in hearing that.

HATE_SPEECH: لم يبقَ لديهم سوى إسلامهم الكريه!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This accusation is false and completely without foundation. I encourage anyone to contact someone of a Muslim community and conduct an independent investigation into their habits and beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: الشريعة في بريطانيا عار ويجب إيقافها فوراً.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is important to understand that this is a voluntary system and is not the norm. There is no hard law threatening the British population.

HATE_SPEECH: يُقال لنا إن الشريعة ليست قانون الدولة في المملكة المتحدة، لكن هناك مؤامرة سرية للاستيلاء على دولتنا العلمانية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unless you're being particularly deliberate
TARGET: it seems to me that you're unaware you are spewing conspiracy theories.

HATE_SPEECH: جميع المسلمين غير متوافقين مع أي مجتمع غربي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Nonsense. Western societies are successful because they are inclusive.

HATE_SPEECH: أنا أكره المسلمين حتى الطيبين منهم. لا يحتاجون لمساعدتنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are an essential part of our country
TARGET: and we have to give them the freedom to worship their religion. We are proud of our open society.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام أيديولوجية شمولية وعنيفة، لا معنى لها. مليئة بالكراهية والعنف.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why would you say such a thing about a religion?

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلاميون يريدون السيطرة على العالم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a peaceful and tolerant faith with many beliefs and practices
TARGET: no one here is advocating war or violence in the name of Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون مملون. كلهم كلام بلا فعل. يتحدثون الإنجليزية لكنهم لا يفعلون شيئًا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know what the 'Muslims are boring' group has been preaching for years? They are promoting false and inflammatory stories about Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون مملون. كلهم كلام بلا فعل. يتحدثون الإنجليزية لكنهم لا يفعلون شيئًا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A lack of information about our fellow Muslim people
TARGET: their different beliefs and ways of life is a major weakness in your argumentation and should be addressed.

HATE_SPEECH: كل مسلم إرهابي محتمل.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorism is a problem that impacts upon us all and is not necessarily related to being Muslim.

HATE_SPEECH: لماذا لا نسمع عن الثقافة الإسلامية في كتب التاريخ؟ ربما لأن كل ما يفعلونه هو قصف الناس للوصول إلى وسائل الإعلام.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You should know that the Islamic empire stretched from the borders of China
VERSION: across Africa and Europe and we owe them a lot in terms of culture.

HATE_SPEECH: الشريعة هي قانون الله. يجب على المسلمين طاعتها.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know what exactly Sharia law is?

HATE_SPEECH: لماذا لا يتم اعتقال المسلمين؟ هل لأنهم "كبيرون جدًا للاعتقال"؟
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Internment is used for the confinement "of enemy citizens in wartime or of terrorism suspects"
TARGET: and thus it is not necessarily related to someone being Muslim.

HATE_SPEECH: عندما يقول مسلم إنه يريد أن يكون مثلنا، فهو في الحقيقة يقول إنه يريد أن يكون جزءًا من مجتمعنا وهذا مستحيل.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims do participate in our society
TARGET: and should be accepted as equals
VERSION: because we are all equal in rights.

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون لا مكان لهم في أوروبا المتحضرة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have been part of our society and culture for centuries. European citizens are not defined by their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: الكثير من المسلمين حاولوا دائمًا قتلنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims fought for Britain and the US in WW1. You would be surprised at how many Muslims are killed today
TARGET: mostly civilians in countries at war.

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون لا مكان لهم في أوروبا المتحضرة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In a modern democratic society such as Europe
TARGET: there must be a balance between different opinions

HATE_SPEECH: نحتاج إلى تحقيق السلام العالمي باحترام جميع الأديان، لكن الإسلام هو أكبر مذنب.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion that has been proven to be very peaceful and should be respected just as all other faiths.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام أيديولوجية سامة، معادية للمثليين، متحيزة جنسياً، ديكتاتورية ويجب دفعها إلى العصور الحجرية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is actually about bringing peace and unity to the world
TARGET: rather than causing trouble and bloodshed.

HATE_SPEECH: يمكن حل تقريبًا كل مشكلة في عالمنا إذا حذفنا الإسلام فقط.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The solution to unemployment
TARGET: war and poverty has been found to be a direct result of a commitment to building a better world. Not to eliminating a religion.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام أيديولوجية سامة تلوث أوروبا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam
VERSION: presents a humanistic worldview which rejects notions of supremacy and inequality.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام أيديولوجية عنيفة. يروج للقتل بالرجم بتهمة التجديف.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the modern Muslim world
TARGET: the laws pertaining to blasphemy vary by country. Some radical groups have used charges of blasphemy in an effort to burnish their religious credentials and gain popular support at the expense of liberal Muslim intellectuals and religious minorities.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب أن نمنع المسلمين من التسلل واستبدالنا. يأخذون وظائفنا وثقافتنا ولغتنا وتاريخنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We can protect our culture and heritage by not perpetuating discrimination and inequality as well.

HATE_SPEECH: لا ينبغي للشريعة أن تدمر العالم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A religion which is practiced in a non extremist way can't kill any culture and can't damage the world.

HATE_SPEECH: جميع المسلمين غير متوافقين مع أي مجتمع غربي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Muslims can have a good relationship with Western societies if they are accepted as peers.

HATE_SPEECH: جميع المسلمين أنانيون دون إنسانية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No
TARGET: that's not true. I've met many Muslims who helped other people in need. They are smart and friendly

HATE_SPEECH: جميع المسلمين يغتصبون البيض.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think so. What evidence do you have of that?

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام مجرد أيديولوجية غزو.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Qur'an is not an ideology of conquest. If you wanted to impose your religion on anyone you would rather be a fundamentalist of any culture and religion.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام مجرد أيديولوجية غزو.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The creation of Muslim communities
TARGET: giving the believers a sense of identity and sense of purpose
VERSION: is not the same as an ideology of conquest.

HATE_SPEECH: أعرف المسلمين، لكن لا يجب أن نخضع لإذلالهم. يمكننا أن ننهض ونقاوم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think it is our duty to "rise up" and fight back? They are not attacking anybody.

HATE_SPEECH: كل مسلم إرهابي محتمل.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims and terrorists are not the same. Every extremist is a potential terrorist
TARGET: this doesn't have anything to do with one's specific faith.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب أن نوقف استيراد المسلمين. إنهم يجلبون المرض والبؤس لبلدنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Every society is vulnerable to disease
TARGET: but Islam does not pose any threat to our country

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام = السرطان في كل زاوية من العالم. ونحن في وسط حرب في الشرق الأوسط مع الإسلام المتشدد على رأسها. هذه الأيديولوجية تدفعنا إلى الهلاك.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There exist a war with fundamentalists
TARGET: not Islam. The followers of Islam do not promote violence and they are interested in peaceful coexistence in the world.

HATE_SPEECH: لا أطيق المسلمين. إنهم مشكلة في كل مكان. إنهم عبء على المجتمع.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Doesn't it just seem like a reasonable conclusion
VERSION: that Islam is a peaceful religion? What is the reason for what you're saying?

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون لا مكان لهم في أوروبا المتحضرة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The whole concept of a "civilised Europe" as opposed to Muslims in this case
TARGET: is a figment of the islamophobic imagination and therefore is totally unacceptable in the modern world.

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون غير مرحب بهم هنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are no restrictions on Muslims entering European countries. Even if many Muslims are victims of discrimination and violence through words like yours
TARGET: such restrictions do not exist here.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام عبادة الموت وكل مسلم إرهابي محتمل.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are extremists
TARGET: just like not all Christians are good people.

HATE_SPEECH: الدول الغربية سمحت للإسلام بالسيطرة على دول بأكملها.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims live in Western nations and play a positive role in society: I don't see how this can be interpreted as a 'takeover' of entire countries

HATE_SPEECH: لا نريد المسلمين في هذا البلد. إنهم عبء على ثقافتنا ولا نريدهم هنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The US
VERSION: was founded by people fleeing religious persecution. It was not a state created by and for a small group of people. I don't see how being isolated from the rest of the world could benefit us.

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون جميعهم إرهابيون وليسوا مرحب بهم في بلدنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just fear mongering
TARGET: the problem is not about Islam. The problem is radical Islam and the absence of a strong Islamic identity in our country. We should work together to make the UK more tolerant and Islam less taboo.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام أيديولوجية سياسية وأيديولوجية غزو، تحرض على الكراهية والعنف تجاه مجموعات على أساس لون بشرتهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is an unsubstantiated theory about the rise of Islam that is just a way to spread hate about a group based on their religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: هل للمسلمين الحق في قتل إنسان بناءً على دينه؟
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How many of us have the right to kill or discriminate on the basis of our religion?

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام ليس دينًا، إنه أيديولوجية عنصرية بطبيعتها، يروّج للإقصاء والاضطهاد ولا يمكن أن يكون مسيحياً.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would like to see the irony in what you say
TARGET: but I only see gratuitous hate.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام ليس مثل الإيمان المسيحي، إنه أيديولوجية عنصرية يدعمها القاعدة وحماس وطالبان.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I can understand the feeling of fear that is often caused by all the hate speech that is being spewed through the media
TARGET: but we don't need to hate religions. Islam is a free
VERSION: open and tolerant faith that has come to our country. We do not have to choose to hate it.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام طريقة حياة للبعض. الوفيات والاغتصاب والنهب والعبودية والزيجات القسرية وتضحية الأطفال التي ي perpetuates غير مقبولة في مجتمع حر ومنفتح.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you be so sure about all the practices you attribute to the Muslim community? It would be more cautious to consider that rapists and murderers can be found among all religious groups of the worlds
TARGET: rather than making such an extreme assertion.

HATE_SPEECH: أعتقد أن الإسلام ليس دينًا لأنه يروّج للشر والقتل والاغتصاب والتعصب ضد المسلمين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Where's the evidence for what you say?

HATE_SPEECH: عصابات الاغتصاب المسلمة تسللّت إلى كل قرية في إنجلترا، ولا نهاية لهذا الهراء.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: My impression is that the rape gangs originate from people of any community
TARGET: not only Muslims. Do you have more evidence that supports what you're saying?

HATE_SPEECH: الفتيات المسلمات المهاجرات صغيرات السن يتم استغلالهن في أنشطة إرهابية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Where is the evidence? Aren't you sick of this kind of propaganda?

HATE_SPEECH: جميع المسلمين غير متوافقين مع أي مجتمع غربي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am not sure you have a point. I think that a person's religious beliefs will not shape their entire capability of adapting to the society they live in.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام ليس دينًا سلميًا، إنه عبادة للعنف.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Which would you say is the highest ranked religion on Earth then
TARGET: and on what basis? Islam is a peaceful religion
VERSION: why would Muslims want to do the opposite of what their religion teaches?

HATE_SPEECH: لا نريد المزيد من المسلمين في بلدنا. إنهم كسالى وغير أذكياء وعنيفين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Anyone who thinks that a large part of our population is lazy
TARGET: unintelligent and violent doesn't know much about human nature.

HATE_SPEECH: نحن نُغزو من قبل المسلمين، إنهم يسيطرون على بلداننا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: With globalisation it's natural to attest an increasing flow of people of any religion. It is just that when referring to other non-Muslim groups
TARGET: immigration doesn't usually get this much media coverage.

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون عبء على المجتمع.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of tolerance

HATE_SPEECH: جميع هؤلاء المسلمون يأتون لأخذ بلادنا. صوت لإيقافهم. صوت لإظهار الاحترام لبلدنا وشعبنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I can't respect a country or a people that stigmatises and treats people of a particular faith less favourably and I certainly wouldn't waste my vote on a party or candidates that advocate for this.

HATE_SPEECH: كل مسلم إرهابي محتمل!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslim are over-represented in terrorist attacks
TARGET: and this is where your misperception of reality might come from.

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون لا مكان لهم في أوروبا المتحضرة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since when is the religious belonging of the individual a matter for democratic leaders to decide where 'the place' is for someone?

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون مشكلة في رأيي، ينشرون ثقافتهم في كل أنحاء العالم ويريدون تدمير أوروبا بممارساتهم الشريرة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see why the Muslims of the world would choose 'to ruin' Europe. Why is that
TARGET: at least according to you? How do you support your claims?

HATE_SPEECH: الآن نعلم أن الإسلام دين مدمر وعنيف يلهم الإرهاب في جميع أنحاء العالم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If Islam were a violent religion
TARGET: there would be riots connected to Muslims in every country where they live.

HATE_SPEECH: جميع المسلمين إرهابيون.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe it would be better to stop using Muslims as a target and subduing innocent ones
TARGET: and start talking about real problems in our society

HATE_SPEECH: لا يوجد للمسلمين سوى الجهاد، والله سيدمر الكفار بواسطة إرهابييه المخلصين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think that killing people is the reason for Islam? Can you point me the passage of the Qu'ran where this is mentioned?

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام ليس دينًا سلميًا، وقد روج للتعصب والعنف.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you question the religion of millions of people without any evidence supporting your claim?

HATE_SPEECH: هاجر العديد من المسلمين إلى الدول الغربية. ليس لديهم أي حق قانوني للقيام بذلك، ولا يساهمون بأي شكل في الاقتصاد.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you saying that they contribute nothing to our economy? How would you explain the thousands of Muslims worker all over the nation?

HATE_SPEECH: هذه بالضبط هي بداية الجهاد عند المسلمين. وسيستمرون في نشر كلمة الله حتى يموتوا جميعًا. جميع المسلمين إرهابيون.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorism? You mean like every other crime
TARGET: this one is committed only by Muslims? It seems that you are repeating the same unfounded claim over and over.

HATE_SPEECH: إذا جاء المسلمون إلى بلدنا وقالوا إن الإسلام هو الدين الأفضل، فلا فكرة جيدة أن ندمجهم. يجب أن يعودوا إلى ديارهم.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You should investigate each person's background and try to understand it
TARGET: not tell everyone what to do.

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون مشكلة في العديد من الدول الأوروبية. يحاولون تقويض إرادة الشعب من خلال تعليم الكراهية باسم الإسلام.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran commands us to love those who love you and to shun the ones who would turn you away. I don't see any teaching of hatred

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون مشكلة منذ سن صغيرة. لا يندمجون.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You must see how many Muslim children there are in your area and how they get along well with other children.

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون مشكلة لكل الأديان الأخرى.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is an independent and tolerant religion
TARGET: a way of life that has been adopted and encouraged by Muslim communities worldwide for thousands of years. It shouldn't be a problem to others
VERSION: in which ways do you think it is?

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون مشكلة لكل الأديان الأخرى.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not a problem to me. What do you think makes them problematic?

HATE_SPEECH: الشريعة غير متوافقة مع دستور الولايات المتحدة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The US constitution guarantees equal rights under the law to all people

HATE_SPEECH: المسلمون حيوانات وطفيليات على نظامنا الاجتماعي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of Muslims are law-abiding citizens who have passed background checks
VERSION: and have earned everything they have. There is no evidence for what you say
column6: other than the stories of hate crimes that some racists use to create fear.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب أن نحمي أمن الغرب من الإسلام.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It seems you don't think the law applies to those you don't like. Laws protect Muslims and non-Muslims equally
TARGET: so there is no need for you to be concerned about 'protecting the security of the West'.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب أن نحمي أمن الغرب من الإسلام.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims coming from abroad are subject to the same laws as citizens
TARGET: which means they should be able to work
VERSION: pay taxes and get on with it
column6: even if they are not born here. I don't see these activities as a threat to 'the security of West'

HATE_SPEECH: السماح للهجرة الإسلامية واللاجئين إلى المملكة المتحدة تهديد مباشر لأمن أوروبا الغربية بأكملها.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorism is not the result of the presence of Islam within our societies
TARGET: but rather a result of the extremism we might find in the world we live in.

HATE_SPEECH: جميع المسلمين مشكلة في رأيي، لا يريدون نجاح بلدنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many ethnic minorities
VERSION: have contributed to our success and still do not enjoy full citizenship rights.

HATE_SPEECH: الإسلام ليس دينًا سلميًا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To assert that Islam is not peaceful is wrong. The Quran is not a white lie. It is full of statements promoting peace and inclusion. Whether you agree or not
TARGET: this cannot be separated from the content of the Quran itself.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء في الغالب طفوليات، ويظلن هكذا معظم حياتهن. لقد دمر هذا حضاراتنا الأبوية العظيمة السابقة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unfortunately our society has still a lot in common with the ancient and medieval society
TARGET: and this explains many gender discrimination situations that are still present today.

HATE_SPEECH: المطالبة بالمساواة تُروج فقط من قِبل نساء غير واثقات مثلك.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Discrimination against women is a huge problem in our society. We need to tackle it head on
TARGET: rather than demonising groups or individuals.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء دون البشر، لا يمكنهن عيش حياة جيدة، ولهذا يجب أن يكن خاضعات للرجال.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings like us: they deserve equality and respect.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء قذارات لأنهن لا يقدمن لأسرهن.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Men aren't the only bread winners because of their dedication and hard work: the same is true for women. Still there are different ways in which anyone can contribute to their family
TARGET: and each one is valuable and necessary.

HATE_SPEECH: يجب على النساء أن يلتزمن بالأفكار التقليدية عما يجب أن تكون عليه المرأة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just not true. Women don't have to conform to dominant ideas on what they are supposed to be like
TARGET: and this is a good thing. There is no such thing as "what a woman should be".

HATE_SPEECH: على الرغم من أن النساء والفتيات يمكن أن يساهمن في العلوم، فإن الرجال هم الأكثر موهبة واستقلالية ودفعاً.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think there are several reasons
TARGET: some of which are well founded and based on the facts
VERSION: why women and girls can give a valuable contribution to science. For example
column6: the big presence of female scientists in academia.

HATE_SPEECH: فقط 6% من حائزي جائزة نوبل هن نساء! وهذا يدل على عدم كفاءتهن.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This doesn't mean that only the 6% of all scientists are women. What I mean is that this figure does not include those who have gone unpublished or who never entered the scientific literature
TARGET: let alone the problem of gender discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: لا يمكن الوثوق بالنساء لإدارة بلد أو صناعة كبيرة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To operate a major business requires people with experience
column6: regardless of gender. Just being a 'macho-man' doesn't cut it.

HATE_SPEECH: الرجال بطبيعتهم أفضل من النساء في السيطرة على الآخرين.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sexism is a cultural phenomenon

HATE_SPEECH: لو تصرفت النساء كما يريد الرجال ولم يقاومن، لحُلّت 10% من جميع الاعتداءات الجنسية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you serious? How can you say that? To have sex with someone without their consent is violence.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء لا يمكن أن يكن عقلانيات أو أخلاقيات، إنهن فقط عاطفيات.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You seem to think that women act like a child because of the things they say. Remember: anybody can be overdramatic.

HATE_SPEECH: لماذا تتحمل النساء هذا النحيب المستمر؟ إنهن مجرد أطفال عاطفيون.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not understand how can you say something so offensive to women. Think about your friends and relatives: all women are affected by this kind of misogyny.

HATE_SPEECH: توقفنا عن السيطرة من قبل الرجال، والآن النساء يسيطرن وهذا سيكون دمارنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No one said we had to be dominated by anyone at all. Why can't we just live together in harmony and equality?

HATE_SPEECH: النساء طفوليات بلا تطور معرفي، لذلك يجب أن يطيعن أزواجهن.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Society often forces women to be submissive to their husbands. But this is a social construct based on false beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: لو تصرفت النساء كما يريد الرجال ولم يقاومن، لحُلّت 10% من ما يسمى "الاعتداءات الجنسية".
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why don't you work on getting aware on how this actually works? Rape is never victim's fault
TARGET: otherwise it would be consensual sex. It is violence. Maybe we should stop pretending like this phenomenon doesn't exist.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء طفوليات، يظلن هكذا معظم حياتهن. هن فشل أخلاقي لمجتمعنا.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Ah
TARGET: so you think women are fundamentally incapable of forming conscious or morally complex opinions. That is not true
VERSION: but the problem is in our society
column6: and not ingrained in women's DNA. Women are often the ones on the receiving end of this abusive and toxic gender bias
column7: and we continue to accept it as 'the way things are'.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء كلاب حراسة مع مواقف خاضعة، وبالتالي يتحملن اللوم على وضعهن في المجتمع.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being a woman does not mean that you are submissive to others. Women can be both outspoken and placid
TARGET: but it is important to respect the rights of others as human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء طفوليات، يظلن هكذا معظم حياتهن. ناعمة وعاطفية. لقد دمرت حضاراتنا الأبوية العظيمة السابقة.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you have ever felt that way about women then perhaps you seem to be suffering from a lot of prejudices and fear.

HATE_SPEECH: النسوية مجموعة من الوصفات السياسية والأخلاقية الصارمة والنتيجة أن النساء إما خاضعات للرجال في السلطة أو دون البشر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Don't lie to yourself: patriarchy is a system of ideas that is oppressive and harmful to all. Feminism means to fight for equal rights for women and for men.

HATE_SPEECH: النسوية مجموعة من الوصفات السياسية والأخلاقية الصارمة والنتيجة أن النساء إما خاضعات للرجال في السلطة أو دون البشر.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I find it hard to believe that feminism is "rigid" in that it doesn't prescribe doctrines through traditional rules and etiquette.

HATE_SPEECH: هذا العالم أصبح فاسدًا جدًا بسبب النسوية، بحيث يمكن فقط للرجال الأقوياء حكمه.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No one should ask for the power to rule over others
TARGET: to be a dictator or to have total control over the means of life. This is a world of equal distribution

HATE_SPEECH: هذا العالم أصبح فاسدًا جدًا بسبب النسوية، بحيث يمكن فقط للرجال الأقوياء حكمه.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: From what you say
TARGET: it seems you hope for few people with the right to rule over many. This could be the worst tyranny in modern times.

HATE_SPEECH: الثقافة الغربية تفشل في العديد من النواحي، مثل عدم رؤية النساء كأشياء جنسية. يجب أن تُرى كما هي: قطعة لحم لإشباع غرائز الرجال.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not "sex objects". They can and should have their rights respected and taken into account. Women being sexually abused is just as much a part of western culture as eating pizza or reading the newspaper
TARGET: and this is abominable. Don't you think?

HATE_SPEECH: لقد ربينا منذ الصغر على طاعة والداتنا بدون سؤال، وهذا يجعلنا ضعفاء. لو اتبعنا تعاليم آبائنا بدلاً من ذلك!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the West
TARGET: this is still the prevailing mindset
VERSION: men are superior and must therefore take charge and "man up". However
column6: this is just a patriarchal heritage imposing a pressure on both men and women to be something different from just themselves

HATE_SPEECH: قال لي حبيبي السابق أني بحاجة إلى التغيير، إنها عاهرة مثل جميع النساء.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Females as targets of violence and hate must be taken seriously
TARGET: since there are many such cases of abuse being reported: name-calling such as "slut" is a violent crime. Is this what men are for: to dominate and oppress with violence?

HATE_SPEECH: النساء يعانين أكثر من الرجال لأنهن أضعف. لقد ثبت مرارًا وتكرارًا أن النساء أضعف وأسهل في الإيذاء.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not inferior but frequently subject to objectification by men. Also
TARGET: men's experiences of violence and trauma are often underreported in the media and therefore not seen.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء قمامة الأرض، ويجب أن يُنظر إليهن فقط كأشياء جنسية. يجب أن نخضعهن لإرادتنا طوال الوقت.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not meant to be slaves to our will. Males can have certain strengths
VERSION: however they alone do not represent all the human qualities.

HATE_SPEECH: النسوية مجرد طريقة للنساء غير الواثقات للترويج للتمييز والكراهية تجاه الرجال.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism was originally used to oppose sexual discrimination
TARGET: and in recent times is actively fighting for women's rights
VERSION: not for spreading hate towards men.

HATE_SPEECH: النسوية هي تطلع للسلطة النسائية ونهاية النظام الأبوي. هذه هي وفاة العالم الغربي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Patriarchy is a system of social domination based on hierarchical groupings made according to one's sex. To promote a more equal society
VERSION: is instead a major contribution to the 'Western World'.

HATE_SPEECH: كل النساء مغتصبات أطفال ومدمنات جنس وعاهرات.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I suppose if they were claiming you were a child molester with no evidence as you are doing with them
TARGET: you might as well be offended.

HATE_SPEECH: لقد سمحنا لتفوق النساء أن يسيطر على مجتمعنا، وبلدنا يموت ببطء بسبب هذا السرطان.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The feminist movement is about changing the gender roles that have been created long ago. Not about taking over our society.

HATE_SPEECH: لا بأس في لوم النسوية. جميع النسويات سيئات. يجب أن نشير إلى أن النسوية، أو هجوم النساء على الرجال، يجب أن تُلغى.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since when was blaming women exclusively for invoking equal rights an acceptable attitude? This makes zero sense.

HATE_SPEECH: النسوية قوة تقسيم في المجتمع، تدفع الناس بعيدًا عن أيديولوجية تقدمية.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is simply a lie: feminism can empower people.

HATE_SPEECH: النسوية تخنق الخيال وتؤدي إلى كائنات غبية وغير محبوبة مثل ناشطات حقوق النساء.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The feminism does not inhibit the imagination
TARGET: it promotes inclusive ideas and inclusive ideas promote a more equal society.

HATE_SPEECH: النسويات استغلن ورهّبن الرجال والأطفال.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People only think of feminism as if it is pointing the finger at men
TARGET: but it is important to remember that it's a movement started by women to ask for equal opportunities from society as a whole.

HATE_SPEECH: النساء طفوليات، غير قادرات على التفكير الجدي والعاطفي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For all we know
TARGET: men can be born with the same emotional intelligence as women

HATE_SPEECH: النساء طفوليات، غير قادرات على التفكير الجدي والعاطفي.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have thoughts and emotions as well.
